Yumi grabbed the box and snagged three more trying to bit into the tough exterior. Ami took the chance to grab the last donut left and ran into the living room. As Yumi choked down the nasty donuts she realized where Ami was headed. In the living room Ami threw the seat cushions aside revealing a half eaten hot dog beneath them. It was old and had been sat on at least once, surely a left over from a week or so before that Kaz had clumsily dropped. Ami wasted no time in stuffing it in her mouth. Yumi watched from the door way furious Ami had beat her to it.

Yumi moved as quickly as she could to the front of the bus into the driver's cab and opened the glove compartment. Lucky for her a partially eaten pretzel had been left in there for a few weeks. Yumi wolfed it down without a second thought. Returning to the kitchen she found Ami hopelessly rooting around the cabinets.

"I'm still so hungry..." Ami moaned as she shook an empty cereal box and shook it over her mouth for a few more crumbs.

"I know what you mean..." Yumi sighed as she rubbed her flat stomach which gurgled loudly. "I've gone without a meal before, I can deal with a little hunger. But right now I would kill for a cheeseburger..."

"I'd dye my hair puke brown for a plate of fried chicken!" Ami sobbed

"I'd play disco music to get a chili dog" Yumi frowned still rubbing her empty gut

"I'd star in one of those naughty movies to get a slice of cake" Ami said slumping down into seat

"I'd give up music forever... just for a real meal right now" Yumi cried out

"You're that hungry?!" Ami gasped

Yumi simply nodded

"Yeah... me too" Ami quietly sighed and looked down at the floor

"Girls! Girls!" Kaz yelled excitedly "I think I found it, I think I found the secret of Julie's success!"

"You did?" Ami perked back up

"What was it?" Yumi looked up from her gloomy slump

"Her music! It's in her music" Kaz said getting eager

"So she is a better musician?" Ami asked puzzled

"Like hell she is!" Yumi shouted out

"No no, IN the music!" Kaz said "Come on!"

The girls followed Kaz to the music mixing room where Kaz had set up. "I was at a loss for what was different until I ran the music through the filter. I thought maybe if I split it up into each instrument I could listen to just her voice, you know see if there was anything special about it vs you girls."

"And?" Yumi asked impatient

"I got an extra file" Kaz said "I had each instrument separated and her voice but their was one more file I didn't know where it came from. The play back on it sounded empty, I thought the computer messed up. Until I changed the frequency!"

"What happened?" Ami asked curiously

"it sounded, like this!" Kaz said and tapped a key on his console. A loud hum vibrated from the speakers making the room shake and Caused Ami and Yumi to howl in pain as they covered their ears.

"Shut it off!" Yumi screamed over the hum

Kaz complied and flicked the button again and the room went silent "That is her secret" Kaz announced

"What? a faulty amp in their recording studio?" Ami asked sarcastically

"No! Subliminal messages!" Kaz screamed as he made his eyes turn in opposite directions

"What? Seriously?" Ami was shocked

"Figures she needs to hypnotize her fans into liking her giant butt" Yumi scoffed

"I think that wacky label has been adding this in the background to her music so people will love it no matter what." Kaz mused "So if we used this thing..."

"What? No way!" Yumi exclaimed "I do not need this cheat trick to rock!"

"Yumi's right Kaz" Ami nodded "This would just be cheating, we shouldn't stoop to their level"

"But girls!" Kaz pleaded "You can't beat her if your fans are being stolen away! If you use it too then she'll be forced to match her skills against yours. This is just evening the odds! Leveling the playing field!"

"Kaz..." The girls sighed

113.title: Daria, the Melencholy girl

choices: Her Aunt is huge a fat red neck just like you'd expect to see here
Her Aunt is a sharp dressed professional such an odd contrast here
1131.content:
Welcome to West Virginia
Wild and Wonderful

The bus flew by the welcome sign as it barreled down I-68 on its way to Ohio. Inside an average looking girl sighed despondently as she watched it pass through the transparent reflection of herself. It wasn't like Daria to be genuinely depressed, normally her melancholy attitude was just her passive aggressive way of dealing with the world but this time she had really landed herself in a mess…

It hadn't been as deliberate or vindictive as Principal Li claimed it had been. It was obvious Li was just seizing the opportunity to be rid of her. Even if Daria’s expulsion would cost the school a sizable chunk of their test score average, Daria was too often an obstacle to Miss. Li’s profiteering schemes. For all she cared the school could become a wasteland of brain dead sheep, she’d always find a way to make money either from them or on them.

The Principal's latest scheme to exploit students didn't agree with Daria, as always, and she had voiced these opinions to any who would listen. When that inevitably failed to gather support Daria had to act on her own. The school was hosting a career open house for student’s to gather “real world” experience in working for various local businesses. What it had really been was a bidding war carried out under the table for the local market to pay for students to come and get a jump start on a lifetime of toiling for little money. Even the nearby army recruitment representative had put down enough money to snag a half dozen young men for a day of mock training in the base.

The biggest contributor had been Cluster Burger. Whatever they had paid had gotten them nearly three busloads of students to be distributed to various locations in the surrounding counties. Their regional manager eager to get a jump start on cultivating a new crop of out of shape greasy pimple faced teens to sling burgers in their restaurants. Perhaps an act of spite by Li, Daria found herself in one of those groups. She watched her classmates lining up to be paid in minimum wage and cheese burgers. While seeing the self-proclaimed fashion club headed for a future of modeling flabby guts hanging out of a tight Cluster Burger uniform had its enjoyment, Daria had to make a stand.

Daria figured if she did a bad enough job and several customers ended up with stomach cramps, complaining of bad meat, the school would take enough heat for sending students to work for a day that Li would be in hot water with the super intendant. Once they had arrived and been given their assignments Daria slipped into the freezer to grab a box of patties while Sandi’s tantrum over a broken nail from manning the fryer basket provided the perfect distraction. The idea had been to set the burgers out by the water heater to thaw and sit in a lukewarm box for a few hours. Then when the lunch rush came she’d serve a few burgers undercooked and create a PR nightmare for the restaurant and the school when people demanded answers. After all, a little food poisoning couldn’t be too bad Daria thought.

It was more than a PR nightmare for everyone involved, Daria included when an expectant mother ended up in the hospital with a nasty illness from undercooked meat.

In all there were 11 cases of food poisoning not including the soon to be mother who had to be rushed in an ambulance. Her case was mild but it was a media frenzy and the first reports were quick to claim the baby’s life was in mortal danger. This opened far more than just an investigation into why local students were spending a day in a restaurant as employee under school sanction. It quickly became a criminal investigation when the media coverage had pictures of a pregnant mother in a hospital gurney clutching her swollen abdomen and crying out for doctors to save her baby. Over hyped or not public outcry demanded someone be responsible that blame could be cast upon. Naturally it was Daria, who was caught on camera intentionally placing the patties by the water heater then turning down the grille heat before cooking them.

Li jumped at the chance to shift the focus to Daria and away from why she was there to begin with, tossing out her history as an anarchist and general trouble maker, claiming she had been beyond the school’s power to help with their current funding. The local news already enjoying a statewide spotlight for Daria’s victims took the claims a step further calling her a home grown terrorist. Daria’s face was on every newspaper and TV for days debating how a local girl had become so angry at the world.

Daria’s mother used her connections to get the PR debacle under control, citing poor judgment and Daria’s past doing charity work as proof she had no intentions of hurting anyone. Daria’s fate was unclear as voices on both sides of the bench argued over what to do with her. When it was suggested she be sent away, perhaps to a school for troubled teens in lieu of prosecution Daria saw a chance to escape the local focus for a while asking she be sent to stay with a close family member such as an aunt. Daria was more than happy to take her exile if it meant she got to go stay with favorite Aunt Amy and let everyone move on to forget about everything.

It seemed like Daria was in luck when the idea pleased everyone who had a real say in the matter. The attorney agreed to let Daria be under probation if she apologized and was sent away for a while. Her parents were happy to oblige her if it meant she’d dodge jail time or some embarrassing correctional facility for criminal teens. And Daria was thrilled to see Amy again.

But Amy was not who she was now on her way to live with.

Ohio welcomes you

Just a few hours away from her new home for the foreseeable future Daria’s stomach knotted up as she recalled the apologetic phone call with her Aunt who simply could not take Daria in. She was two weeks away from a trip to Europe with a business associate and would be there for at least a month. Needing somewhere to dump her right away and Aunt Rita absolutely unwilling to take her Daria’s fate was handed over to her Father’s sister Victoria. Daria had not seen her aunt from her father’s side in years. The last and probably one of the few times she’d met her had been at a wedding for Victoria’s son Richard. Daria didn’t really know much about Aunt Victoria either aside from being a bit spoiled by their grandfather and having a daughter named Ginger close to Daria’s age. Not long after she last saw her Aunt Victoria she had moved to some little town in Ohio and never had any contact with the family until Daria’s father reached out to her to look after Daria.

Welcome to Chirps Creek Ohio
Coziest little town on the Ohio River

The sign for Chirps Creek was rusted and half obscured by dead brush. Nestled in the preverbal armpit of Kentucky and West Virginia Chirps Creek was smack in the middle of a tri-state area. Daria knew the town was going to be hick city when she passed two bait shops and nearly a dozen fast food restaurants before she saw the first few homes, most of which were doublewide trailers.

Daria didn’t expect anything to be particularly different about her Aunt; it had only been a few years since she saw her, maybe three or four since she moved away. Aside from the basics all Daria knew about Victoria’s career was she worked for one of the biggest snack food manufacturers in the country, “Little Missy”. She seemed to have a good job judging from how well off a single mother of two lived when last she met her. Perhaps she’d fallen on hard times or gone slightly insane to have moved to this crummy town but nothing major could have changed. However stepping off the greyhound bus in the tiny bus terminal for Chirps Creek Daria saw the face of her red haired Aunt waving to her enthusiastically. The woman that sat there on the hood of her car was a drastically different Victoria than the prissy beauty queen who Daria had seen last.
1131.title: Daria is sent away for her behavior

choices: Her Cousin is pretty fat herself
Her Cousin is softer but still the self absorbed vally girl she remembered
11311.content:
“Daria! It’s great to see yall again!” her Aunt Victoria gushed as Daria hoisted her duffle bag over one shoulder and picked up a small leather tote she had carried with her on the bus. Her Aunt Victoria slowly lumbered to the step up onto the bus platform but stopped short of stepping up to meet her. Instead she decided to wait for Daria to reach the edge before trying to offer up an unwelcome hug. Daria leaned away but the thick arms of her Aunt caught her pulling her into the fleshy grip. Daria’s Aunt had certainly changed, gone was the gaunt fashion diva, what was pulling Daria into a soft sweaty press was a round tank top and stretch pants wearing pig. As Daria was released from the grip she could see faded stains in the white fabric of the top her aunt wore and trashy makeup with too much eyeliner.

“Aw it’s good to see you again darlin’” her aunt smiled putting chunky hands on her wide dimpled hips letting them sink in a ways. Daria struggled to pick her duffle bag back up after losing it in the hug assault. Victoria turned her back to Daria as she lifted the 30 pound duffle bag, Daria could detect a noticeable lag time between her aunt’s turn and the rest of her ass catching up with her.

Upon reaching her car Victoria happily dove in making the shocks squeak in response as the car tilted to one side slightly. Inside she roared the engine to life and turned on the AC. Only after returning to her air cooled haven did she acknowledge Daria once more, motioning for her to toss her bag in the trunk and hop in.

“So you got yourself in a bit of trouble I hear” Daria found her aunt grinning at her as she slid into the passenger seat. “Raised a bit ah hell an got yourself kicked out of the stuffy school you were goin’ to” Victoria threw the car into reverse and turned the car around.

“Yeah, I’m a real lost cause” Daria exaggerated gloomily “They couldn’t find a book big enough to throw at me so they just threw me out” Daria propped her head onto one arm and stared out the window at the seemingly endless cycle of trailer parks and strip malls.

Her aunt erupted with laughter “Thata girl!” She paused to take a sip of an oversized food mart soda cup “I didn’t like schoolin very much myself, Got the heck outta there when I was still 16 and hot, then again I suppose I’m still doin’ pretty good in the looks department” Victoria tried to strike a pose but had to put her hands back on the steering wheel when the car suddenly drifted into the dirt shoulder.

Breathing a sigh of relief she was still alive Daria had to raise a question to her aunt’s claim. “I thought grandma and grandpa sent you to some private boarding school, some really pretentious one they didn’t even send dad to. You only left early because you got pregnant and they didn’t want to deal with the embarrassment.”

Victoria was silent for a moment, the car started to drift again “I… well…” Victoria’s brow creased and she looked down puzzled. Daria reached over quickly to steady the steering wheel, she was sure this was the first time since she’d gotten off the bus her aunt was actually processing thoughts. “I’m sure I…” Victoria chimed again “Yeah yeah that’s right!” She said at last “I got pregnant and then I…” she trailed off again.

“You had Richard, you tried to be one of the first teen pregnant girls to get a reality TV show but it was the 80s so those didn’t exist yet remember?” Daria led her while driving from the passenger seat.

“Yeah I did…ugh this is givin’ me a head ache” She winced and reached for her extra-large soda. She took a long sip and gulped down several mouthfuls before stopping for air. She seemed much calmer afterwards, the pained expression relaxed and she took control of the wheel again.

Daria waited a moment for her aunt to try to resume the conversation but it seemed she had dropped the matter entirely “So what exactly do you re-“

“Oh look there’s the Little Missy sign!” Victoria abruptly burst out.

The Little Missy snack cake corporation sign was larger than a bus and hung on the side of a tall glass building that loomed over the highway. Behind it a brick building that served as the distribution hub with a line of trucks being loaded up that must have stretched almost a quarter of a mile long. Still further back was a large facility where presumably the many cakes were being made.

“Big place huh?” Victoria smiled back to being in good spirits “They say it’s their hub for this side of the country. They built that place a few years ago and I got transferred here to be a part of some new customer adaptation thing. We gave jobs to everyone in town. Mostly consultant titles which just means I get them to try new products and we talk for a while about what they think of them.” Victoria waved a hand to the messy back seat crowded with empty fast foot bags and crumpled up soda cups. Tucked between them were some large cardboard boxes with the Little Missy logo on them. “It’s a lot more fun than that boring stuff they had me doing before like uh… umm” Victoria’s smile faded, her face bunching up tightly in thought again.

Daria watched the glass tower disappear behind the trees as her Aunt took another big sip of soda. “So what do people do around here for fun?” She tried to find a subject more topical her Aunt might manage to answer.

“Oh lottsa stuff!” She snorted putting the cup back down “We got a big mall nearby, plenty of shopping there, and there’s a bowling alley you can go bowling at”

“Drat I wanted to go to the bowling alley to swim a few laps” Daria quipped in a monotone voice

“What?” Victoria was confused “No you go swimming at the swimming pool stupid” she shook her head “we have that too, it’s by the laundromat, you know what a laundromat is for right?

Daria held her quip in this time but judging by her aunt’s current state of dress she could be asking her the same question. The car took a right onto a gravel road leading into another trailer park. Daria’s stomach tied itself into that familiar knot again when she realized one of these must have been her aunt’s, and now hers, home.

Daria grew even more hopeless as they passed a sign intended as a serious reminder to residents that shooting their fire arms into the air for celebration was against the law. Daria’s face soured as she saw dried dead grass, broken down rusted cars in yards, and make shift grills made from oil drums and other trash that could be found likely dumped in the river. Daria started wondering if she could get a reduced sentence for good behavior, she’d actually help Li with one of her plans at this point if it meant going home right now.

“Here we are! My home sweet home!” Victoria proudly sang. It was a double wide trailer and had an actual patio made of wood on the back with non-broken lawn chairs to sit in. A refreshing change of pace Daria thought to herself lowering her standards already. “Come on and lets find Ginger, I bet she’s dying to show you around”

11312.content:
“Daria! It’s great to see you again!” her Aunt Victoria beamed as Daria hoisted her duffle bag over one shoulder and picked up a small leather tote she had carried with her on the bus. Her Aunt Victoria confidently strode onto the bus platform so they could both get a better look at one another. Daria could see her Aunt had certainly toughened up. Gone was her expensive designer blouse and trendy skirt, now she wore a sharp professional suit. Granted the suit still looked very expensive but the confident air about her aunt showed it was intended to be a statement of her skills and expertise, not a statement of how much money she had to spend like her aunt once strived to flaunt.

“Here let me help you with that” Victoria offered a well-manicured hand with polished and painted nails to take Daria’s duffle for her.

“Thanks Auntie Victoria” Daria obliged in her usual lackluster tone ending on a disingenuous high note. She nearly tossed the bag at her aunt well aware of the weighty books and thick unflattering clothes it was packed with. But to her surprise even her aunt’s strength was clearly new and improved, without flinching Victoria caught the bag with one arm and lifted it easily over her shoulder as she popped the trunk open.

“Your father already gave me all the details but why don’t you fill me in on what happened to get you sent to Chirp’s Creek?” Victoria was friendlier than Daria remember too. As she opened the passenger door and slid into the seat Victoria was smiling at her, does she genuinely care about my feelings on this? Daria thought to herself.

Victoria started the car and backed out of the Bus station parking “There’s not much to tell really” Daria began “I’m a troubled teen who acted out and put some people in the hospital, I belong behind bars” Daria somberly sighed.

But Sarcasm wasn’t going to shield her from her aunt

“Really?” She tried to sound genuinely shocked “Jake said you made a strong statement against your principal’s unscrupulous behavior. I don’t think he fully understood the message you were trying to send but he still stood by whatever it was you did to get yourself in this predicament”


Daria’s focus on the procession of trailer parks passing by was broken as she gave her aunt a dumbfounded look. “Dad said that?”

“No not exactly, you know how Jake is” Victoria looked upward as she searched for the right words “His emotions and his reactions aren’t always on the same page. He was proud of you but he talked a lot about what a mess you’d created. Oh, this is where I work” Victoria gestured to a very large building on the right.

The Little Missy snack cake corporation sign was larger than a bus and hung on the side of a tall glass building that loomed over the highway. Behind it a brick building that served as the distribution hub with a line of trucks being loaded up that must have stretched almost a quarter of a mile long. Still further back was a large facility where presumably the many cakes were being made.

“This is the largest hub on the east coast” Victoria explained while Daria had to shift and look over her shoulder to keep taking in how large the facility was. “I work for the consumer adaptation division; we keep the products popular by working with our customers to offer snack cakes that blow our competitors out of the water. We also test new samples and address consumers who need… more persuasion to buy our products. Let’s just say I make sure nobody can get enough of our cakes.” Victoria looked over at Daria wryly smiling. Daria wasn’t sure what her aunt meant by this but coming out of her shell a bit she decided to ask a bit more about her aunt. “So why here? Why move out here to this… cesspool? Wouldn’t a large distribution and manufacturing facility be much more cost effective in a larger city?

Victoria was tight lipped for a moment and Daria felt a chill enter the car “No” she said curtly, then the smile and warm demeanor returned “Chirp’s creek is the best place for us, we sell a little bit of America in our cakes and what’s more American than small towns?” Daria could feel the prepackaged quality to this answer; it was different than the kind genuine aunt she had been speaking to a few moments ago, Daria had touched on a subject that was making her behave mysteriously.

Daria shifted back to small talk, the local schools, economy, what it was like living here. Daria found her aunt’s responses were more natural when addressing her opinions of the local, but when the responses were in addressing the actual structure and facts of living here she was more rehearsed in her answers. All Daria could gather was her impression of this town was pretty spot on. It was poor and most who lived here were low income. Despite the rhetoric Daria could tell the entire town had become dependent on Little Missy as a lynch pin for the economy and Daria had her suspicions this was by design for Little Missy’s benefit. Looking at her aunt and the car they rode in it was safe to say only those working in the glass tower built for Little Missy made any real money. Her suspicion was confirmed as they turned into a gated community named Missy’s garden.

Entering the gates was like going from night to day. Outside it had been nothing but trailer homes and strip malls. Inside it was large homes with wide lush green lawns. Daria saw double car ports, two and three story houses, and most homes had a pool or some other recreational expenditure using a portion of the sizable backyards. Daria was shocked by the change but at the same time inside her head she was breathing a huge sigh of relief that her exile would be spent here and not in the poverty stricken wasteland outside the gates.

“This is me- I mean, us” Victoria half sang as she pulled into the driveway of one of the large expensive homes. “Come on in I bet Ginger will want to catch up with you too”

Lilo Sighed as she lay in bed. It was after supper and she was on her back with her hand stretched out past her head staring at the ceiling. "Another day where nothing interesting happens" she moaned at last.

Lilo rolled back and forth from side to side restlessly as she tried to cope with the boredom. It had been weeks since the last experiment had gone active and it was the first few weeks of summer, Lilo had no school to go to, no experiments to catch, and a record low in tourism for Hawaii was making for some very uneventful days for Lilo. Jumba was deep in work on more crazy inventions and Pleakley was off to some "Happy Home Makers" conference. Lilo could normally find countless ways to entertain herself but even the wildest imaginations have their off times. Lilo was truly bored and not even Stitch could help her. Lilo looked up again at the ceiling rolling her eyes around the room looking for something to do her eyes finally coming to rest on the corner of the room her bed was in. Lilo sat for a moment looking at all the pictures she had hung there before eventually flipping herself over so she could look at them upright.

"They sure are lucky" Lilo sighed as she looked at the pictures.

For some time now She had been taking and collecting pictures of many of the tourists who came to their island, Always with one common quality among them.... fat. It was true, Lilo had a strange obsession with overweight people. She never could place it, The gentile curves of their bodies, the soft feel of their fat, the way they could happy lay in the sun for hours just relaxing and eating, it was all so alluring to her. Lilo recalled the lady she saw one summer not to long ago, she must have weighed 400 pounds and wore a skimpy Bathing suit that was clearly meant for a woman half her size. Lilo's jaw must have hit the beach when she saw that woman. Lilo had wanted to run right over to her and bury herself in the folds of fat that hung off and in many cases were bursting out of the bathing suit. Lilo had never forgiven herself for forgetting her camera that day. Lilo must have followed her for hours longing to just touch that soft lovely flesh. Lilo never understood what made her desire these things so much. As she lay there day dreaming about all that fat her hands began to find their way to her mid section and began to slowly rub up and down her body. Lilo smiles as she imagined herself getting bigger and bigger.

"I could just eat all I wanted and out grow my clothes and watch myself grow and grow and gro-" Lilo cut out. Was that really her? Her mind had begun to wander for sure but how did she get into the topic of being fat herself? Is that what she wanted? To be as fat as the woman? Lilo closed her eyes and pictured herself at that woman's size, a tantalizing tingle ran through her body as she imagined the possibilities. "Wow..." Lilo thought as she began to breath heavier. "That's was... sort of a rush" she realized.

Looking around she grabbed her pillow and shoved it under her dress, Lilo began to kneed her pillowy body feeling the plushness. The pillow was easily making her feel like twice her size and Lilo was loving how tight her dress felt stretched across her body. She had been this big before... no... bigger. Yeah she had been big before! When they had French Fry cooking for them they had gotten huge! But it wasn't really fat... They had been bloated by the food, she hadn't noticed her love for this feeling then because it was more of a balloon feeling, but come to think of it despite the fear she had felt at the time over being unable to stop herself and the fact French Fry tried to eat them she had such a peaceful feeling about the whole situation due to her enjoying the size and feel of being so big and soft. If only she could be that big again.... that big... and actually fat this time... Could she? French Fry was great at cooking and making fattening foods but they never made you truly fat, just bloated, and if the intake wasn't kept up it would burn off in a few days.

"Maybe Jumba can help me" Lilo thought. She pulled the pillow from under her dress and rushed down to Jumba's room to find out more.

'No no, no more food for me. Any more and it'll just add to this belly I've going.' she thought and she patted her slightly rounder belly, which wobbled a bit in response.

Meanwhile, Lilo was at the buffet. She was struggling to choose what exactly she wanted, since she wasn't allowed too much. The choices were too hard to make.

'There's so much good and fattening food here! I have to make a plan so I can eat as much as I can and fatten up, but what can I do?' Lilo thought. She looked over to the dessert section and suddenly it struck her.
11412112.title: A buffet

114121121.content:
Lilo smiled a devilish smile and walked up to the dessert table in the buffet. Time to do some fattening of her own...

Nani was still at the table contemplating getting a second plate. She knew in her heart she wanted more but her conscience told her that it was not a good idea. But damn it, those ribs looked so good!

Nani was soon broken out of her trance when Lilo returned to the table. Her plate was smaller and had two lovely large slices of apple pie on it. Nani started to drool and stare at them, they were calling her name. But she soon snapped back.

"I thought you were hungry, Lilo. What happened to getting seconds?" She quizzed. This was not like the girl to refuse more food.

"Yeah, I was going to then I thought I wanted dessert so I grabbed some, but..." Lilo trailed off

"But what?" Nani said.

"But I'm pretty darn full now that I think about it. I don't think I'm gonna be able to eat another bite! Too bad this great food is going to go to waste!"

Nani began to sweat, her brows were dripping. Too bad indeed, all that sweet, sweet pie is a real shame to pass up.

"Unless..." Lilo started, trying to play coy, "you wanted to have them." She offered.

Nani was sweating buckets now, her hands were trembling. It took all her effort not to stab her fork into the crust of her pie in an instant. Together, the juicy and soft slices had to be the size of her head and they Rose from the plate several inches. Nani could see the gooey pie filling oozing from beside, and she practically taste the sugary goodness from where she sat.

"I...I-I can't, Lilo..." she shook her head, attempting to stay strong, "I've been eating a lot as it is, I couldn't possibly..."

"Yeah, maybe that's true, but what's two more slices of pie really gonna do?" she counter-claimed. Lilo really knew how to drive a hard bargain.

Nani shook her head. "It's...I can't..." She said unconvincingly. "I have to have the willpower to say no. Always be strong enough to say no when you have to."

Lilo shrugged, "Okay, suit yourself big sis. I'll go throw it away then. But just so you know," she leaned toward Nani, plate in hand, and whispered in her ear. "There's also apple fritters over there too..."

That did it, the dam broke and Nani gave in to temptation. "Give me those damn pies!" She grabbed them from Lilo and dug into them with gusto, savoring the first few gooey bites with pleasure. She looked over to Lilo, who watched with a big grin on her face. "And go grab me some apple fritters, too!" She insisted.

Lilo ran off to the buffet. The plan worked! Nani's resistance has been broken! Lilo grabbed several plates and filled one of them with several more apple pie slices and tons of apple fritters. She filled the other couple plates with tons of other desserts. Various peices of cake, tons of banana bread lathered in butterscotch pudding, and a bunch of eclairs. She brought it all back to the table. She made several more trips, bringing over more and more food each time. Eventually she ran out of dessert so she started bringing over burgers and hotdogs, and even some creamy thick pasta alfredo. Very quickly the table was full of desserts and dinners and some were even on the adjacent tables since the small booth table only had so much room.

Nani was too busy gorging herself on apple fritters and apple pie to notice or care. Lilo sat down and began to feast on the food before them. She started with the banana bread, her favorite. Nani soon finished her apple delights, and instead of questioning the appearance of more food, she immediately began to gorge upon the several burgers and hotdogs on the table. Lilo dove into the cakes after finishing the last of the pudding. Faster and faster, the sisters continued to stuff themselves silly, barely aware of their surroundings.

Their bellies were bloated and round, and Nani's outfit did nothing to conceal her potbelly. Several other tables were in awe or disgust at them, but they were too busy to care. They had been feasting for only an hour when they ran out of food. But instead of being done, they both got up and made a beeline for more food. They were both very full, and their bellies made them look several months pregnant at this point, but they were too engrossed in their own gluttony to care. Due to their overstuffed state, getting up was a feat and walking looked a bit more like waddling, but they still made the trek.

Nani began filling her plates with more and more desserts. Ice cream, blueberry pie, creamy cheesecake. Absolutely anything sweet made its way on to her many plates. Lilo, on the other hand, was attacking the other parts of the buffet. She filled plate after plate with foods like steak, thick lasagna, homemade pizza, and even full sub sandwiches. They hurridedly brought back their food to their tables and began to feast again, hardly questioning why.

Nani was too far into a hedonistic trance to think about her actions. Her main and only goal was too fill her gob with any and confectionery she could find and want. Nani's gluttony showed no signs of stopping as she tore through her lemon meringue pie like an animal. This was certainly a new experience to her, one that she has yet to think much about. Lilo was in heaven, she didn't think her feast would entail this much food, but as long as it kept coming Lilo was happy to eat. She was long past full to the point it started to hurt, but like a true fattening girl she still ate through the pain with gusto, happy to have such great tasting food. With every bite, Lilo reveled in how much she and Nani would gain from this session alone.

Soon enough, both girls had finished eating. Lilo's stomach looked enormous, round and bulging, she looked like she was one month overdue. She sat back and patted her belly in satisfaction, wincing a little due to its sensitivity. Her eyes were beginning to glaze over but she shot awake as Nani let loose a giant belch.

"Excuse me," Nani said weakly. Lilo swore her hair blew back. She looked over at her sister, and it became clear that Nani was the one who ate the most. She was leaning back and even then her belly was still pushing into the table in front of her. It was so round and full of creamy brown flesh. If Lilo looked overdue, Nani looked like she was about to burst with quads in a matter of seconds.

"Wha-" Nani stuttered, "What even happened?" She asked, recovering from her stupor. The last few hours seemed like a haze. She looked in front of her and saw the piles and piles of empty plates that were stacked up in front of her and Lilo. She saw the little girl was sporting a huge stuffed round belly under her floral skirt, and then she looked down.

Her eyes bulged out of her head, "Holy moly..." was all she could get out. She began rubbing her massive stomach. She was beginning to peice together what had happened, and she soon remembered her last three hours of heavy feasting.

"That was *urp*, so good sis! Wasn't it?" Lilo said while rubbing her overstuffed gut.

"It certainly was, little sis..." Nani couldn't disagree. The food was heavenly, that she could not deny. While she did feel guilty for making a pig of herself and eating way more in one sitting than she had in her entire life. She couldn't help but feel a certain pride in her, too. She enjoyed the feeling of letting loose for awhile, and this feeling of overstuffed bliss was rather relaxing...for now...

"Nani, we have to come back next weekend. Please?" Lilo begged, jostling her stomach a little too much and wincing.

Nani rubbed her belly with one hand and picked up a flyer hiding underneath the dishes in another. It was a flyer for half-off the buffet on the weekends only.

"With food like this and deals like that." She said. "We'd be crazy not to come back every weekend!"
114121121.title: Tempt Nani to stuff herself

1141211211.content:
"Lilo! Breakfast time!" Nani called. Lilo stirred awake, groggy and confused. It was a bright morning and the sunlight trickled through her skylight and danced in the air. Lilo stretched and yawned, trying to wake herself up. Lilo's stomach rumbled and she put her hand on it.

"C'mon, Lilo! It's getting cold!"

Lilo shot out of bed. She quickly began to dress herself The effects of the last few days had had an impact on her body. Ever since that great binge, Nani had been making heartier and unhealthy breakfasts, and dinners were always either take out, or pizza delivery. It almost took her by surprise, she didn't expect Nani to change her diet so soon but they have both been eating almost non-stop since that day at the buffet. Most everyday, she would sit by the couch and snack away all day on various foods she would find in the kitchen. Nani had been working a slow week, she managed to keep a desk job as secretary at the company she worked for quite a while now, but the job was very boring and Nani often passed the time by eating whatever she could find or bring with her.

Lilo stripped off her clothes and looked at the mirror. She hadn't changed much, but she has definitely gained at least a couple pounds in the last few days. Her belly had a new curve to it, and it seemed to be fuller and heavier than before, if not slightly so. Her thighs had accumulated some fat, and her arms were definitely getting flabbier. She turned around and saw that some fat even went to her hips and butt too, and she was beginning to get a bit of a bubble butt.

She smiled, 'Its only been a few days and I'm already getting fatter, I can't wait to see where I'll be in a month or so."

Lilo went downstairs and to the kitchen table. She walked in to see Nani at the sink, fixing a large plate of bacon. She set it on the table and looked at Lilo.

"Good morning sleepyhead!" She said. Lilo looked at Nani's body and saw she had definitely gained in the five days too. Nani's arms had previously had tone and some muscle, but that was all gone and beginning to be replaced with flab. Her legs look thick too and some fat had barely begun to gather under her chin. Her breasts had accumulated some growth but not by any mentionable means yet. Her shorts looked very tight and her hips were flaring out from them, she had noticeable love handles that were sticking from her torso, looking plumper and softer. Her ass had gotten a bit fatter too, and had the slightest wobble to it when she walked.

Nani's biggest feature by far was her belly though. Once having solid abs, her flat trim stomach had been replaced by a small potbelly. It stuck out in front an inch or two, and her usually revealing and short shirt was tight around her torso and her belly peeking out with more flesh than usual. Nani didn't really pay mind to it, but her belly was undeniably chubbier and rounder than it had ever been before. Overall, Nani seemed to have gained at little under ten pounds in the last month.

Lilo snapped back into reality and looked at the table. Her jaw gaped wide open. Upon it was the biggest breakfast that she had ever seen Nani cook. There were several plates of bacon, several stacks of pancakes and waffles, tons of hash browns. There were lots of cinnabuns, eclairs, and even strudel, plus many many more fattening breakfast foods layered the table. The breakfasts Nani made recently didn't even amount to this much food; just a lot of pancakes slathered in syrup or enough peices of bacon to make a full pig out of. Nothing with as many choices as this or on the scale of this feast before Lilo; this was definitely Nani's most ambitious meal yet.

"Whoa!" Lilo said, "Look at all that food! Why did you make so much?"

"I didn't know what I wanted and I was really hungry so I started cooking and baking and ended up making a huge breakfast for us! Looks good, doesn't it?" Nani grinned. "Be ready to eat your fill. I won't be able to finish it all myself, and you need some good nutrition in order to grow strong."

Lilo side-eyed her sister on that one. Good nutrition? There was about as much healthy nutrition on that table as there are in an entire candy store downtown. Lilo enjoyed the change of pace these last few days and the dietary choices Nani supplied, but it was starting to become too much too fast. It was a tad unnerving, even for Lilo, and decided to ask what was up

"Nutrition? Nani, why have we been eating so much lately. Not that I'm complaining or anything, but ever since the buffet we've been doing a lot of this overeating!"

Nani smiled, "Well, work has been pretty slow but also pretty stressful, and I don't know, I just thought that I would let us indulge for a little while." She shrugged, "You enjoy it, I enjoy it. Who really cares? It's not hurting anything!"

Lilo grinned, "But what about eating healthy? You always used to tell me about it..." She walked over and poked her sister in her round belly. "Won't we just gain more weight?"

"Who ever said gaining a couple pounds was so bad? I'm sure we'll be okay. let's just enjoy ourselves, alright?"

Lilo was grinning huge by now, "If you say so..."

12112.content:
Raven closed the cover of a red leather bound tome with wispy looking runes scrawled around it like chains. She thumped her fingers across it several times deep in thought. "Talarok" That's what he said his name was, Talarok and nothing more. It was a lie to be sure. A demon does not give out it's name for free, knowing a demons name is the first step in binding that demon to your control. What's more, demon names are always much longer, their egos always leading them to include titles like "The Black Decay" and "Ruler Of Death". But even when they give you a fake name it's a clue to their true identity, eager to brag about their power hubris tends to lead demons into giving away who they are once you start to deal with them enough. But Raven had been talking to Talarok for two weeks now through her relay stone and still he was keeping all his cards face down. Suddenly a knock came from the door breaking her concentration.

"Hey we're here" Came a monotone sigh of a voice

"You can come in" Raven called out with the same enthusiasm

The doors spread open to reveal Jinx with Starfire hovering happily behind her. The young walking misfortune and cheerful alien girl entered Raven's room.

"Oh Raven I am so glad we are throwing a sleepover, it will be most fun!" Starfire beamed

"Star..." Raven winced at her friend's misunderstanding "This isn't a sleep over , I need you two for a minor ritual I need to perform" Raven explained as she set about laying down pillows for them to sit on around a circle, a small oval shaped stone with a hole in it sat on a pedestal at the center of the circle. Raven handed them both a cup of tea to relax them before they began.

"Why did you call for me exactly?" Jinx looked at Raven funny as she was handed her tea "Just because I'm not with the hive anymore doesn't make us girlfriends you know"

Raven frowned and looked at Jinx skeptically "I know you're not our ally but I need help and you were one of the few people I felt I could trust that could help me with this"

"Oh joyous!" Starfire broke in "This sounds like it will be one of those sleep over party games!"

"What?" Jinx choked slightly on her tea "You'd trust me more than that bossy leader of yours or the green twerp?"

"Not in a million years" Raven hissed with a stern glare "But they didn't fit the requirements of this ritual..."

"And that would be?" Jinx narrowed her eyes and cocked her head to one side with a hand on her hip

"I was instructed..." Raven rolled her eyes and looked away from the two girls "That to perform the ritual we'd need 3 virgin girls"

"Yo-shhhfff I, bu... WHAT?!?" Jinx blurted out dumb struck. Starfire just turned beet red and tried to pretend she was too busy drinking her tea to comment.

"...near the apex of their maturity into adulthood to join their hands and-"

"Wait just a second sister!" Jinx stopped her "What makes you think I'm a virgin!?" Jinx tried to shove her finger in Raven's face and hold the tea with the same hand without blocking her glare at the blue haired sorceress. "Just because you can't get any doesn't mean I'm in the same boat! Unlike you I actually have a man!"

"Oh please" Raven grumbled "an ice queen like you?" Raven pushed a stunned Jinx's hand aside "You'll probably keep teasing flash for a year before you actually get serious about letting him go past second base"

"Oh like you know me so well?!" Jinx boiled "I'll have you know I've had his hands all over m-" Jinx began to grow louder and louder until Starfire cut in.

"Friends Friends! Please let us not bicker about our... purity" Starfire pleaded "Can we not bury the tree felling instrument and form new bonds?"

Raven and Jinx exchanged heated glances before groaning "Fine!" Jinx spat

"Anyway..." Raven sighed and looked at Jinx "I would have called Bumbblebee or Argent but with the confidence and sass Bumbblebee has... or the way Argent dresses... I was worried they've..."

"Been all the way?" Jinx huffed "I still call BS on your assumption that I'm..."

"Yes but you're still here aren't you?" Raven replied flatly "I already told you this calls for young pretty virgins and you're still here so I can only assume..."

"Ugh! Fine!" Jinx growled in frustration "I'm a virgin ok?!" Jinx stared at Raven daring her to show even the slightest sign of victory but Raven just held her poker face. "tck... I'll help with your dumb pow-wow"

"Oh yay!" Starfire cheered and hugged a surprised Jinx

"Good then next we'll need to apply these markings to your hands and chest, Starfire please take off your gloves and unlatch your collar" Raven held up a jar of sickly green liquid and used it to paint symbols on each girls palm and back of the hand as well as a symbol over their hearts.

"So just what is this ritual about anyway?" Jinx asked as she adjusted her shirt back up to cover her chest once more.

"I'm contacting a demon" Raven said stoically looking away

"What?! Raven no!" Starfire gasped

Jinx smirked "Little miss goody two shoes is dabbling in some hardcore evil here..."

"Shut up!" Raven growled at them making Jinx frown again and cross her arms, Starfire's face twisted and turned to a hurt rejected pout as she cringed at her friend's outburst. "Sorry, I don't mean to sound angry, but I'm being careful ok? I haven't told them anything about myself, they don't know who I am or where I am. But... I have to do this, I need to find out..."

"Find out what?" Starfire asked standing up again and moving close to her friend

"If my dad is still alive..." Raven said

"Still alive?" Starfire asked in a hushed voice "I do not understand, did we not soundly defeat him already? Do we still have reason to fear a return?"

"Maybe maybe not" Raven sighed "Demon's don't die, their spirits tend to remain no matter what you do, the only way to be rid of a demon is to bind their souls in some form of prison and hope they never escape for all eternity."

"So... where is your dad then?" Jinx asked as she moved to sit on one of the pillows
