(Spoiler warning for the tv series. If you haven't seen it, do so, its great!)




Four months after the defeat of fire lord Ozai

The Crane Isle Rehabilitation Asylum had seen its fair share of dangerous occupants:A Yu Yan archer who hallucinated targets onto unsuspecting citizens' behinds, a fire-bending chef who thought his dishes should be cooked as they were being savored, and even a rather powerfully built woman who believed herself to be a platypus bear.
However, no inmate in the Crane Isle Rehabilitation Asylum was more feared than its newest member. Not once since her arrival was this patient deemed fit for a non-chilled cell environment or a binding removal. The staff of the Asylum waited in vain for the look of madness in the eyes of former Fire Lord Azula to abate to provide such luxuries. Refusing to communicate during talking sessions and attempting a jailbreak during her first week there, Azula and her reputation as extremely potent firebender kept everyone who came into contact with her on edge. Often refusing to eat, the raven-haired conqueror had slowly become almost skeletal, furthering her reputation as a monster with a girl's body.

Today, however, was different. Azula was calm and was quite ready to tell the asylum workers whatever they needed to hear to make them unshackle her. She knew she wouldn't be able to firebend her way out of the asylum, but as of that day, she had another approach.Over the last four months Azula had little to focus on but her own frustration and the sound of her own heart. As days stretched into weeks, Azula became acutely aware that the energy that kept her heart beating and her lungs breathing was nothing more than heat. And where there is heat, there is fire.

"....Guard. I would like to speak to my councilor. I hope I haven't frightened him with my behavior. I've done a lot of thinking, and I believe it is time for me to rethink my motivations in life." As one of her guards hurried away from her padded, chilled cell, Azula's lips bent into her devilish smile. No one would suspect that their own inner workings could be bent to her will.She knew it could be done. Her test had been successful.

In her rage and frustration at being dethroned by her brother and betrayed by her closest friends, Azula had begun to waste away into skin and bones, rarely eating more than a slice of bread or two per day. As of this month, she had grown gaunt-cheeked and skeletal looking.

Azula's councilor couldn't explain how his newest patient had seemingly fattened back up to her starting weight over the last week while her food trays still came out of her cell largely full, but at least now he could attribute it to her improving mental condition. A perfectly shapely, smiling Azula greeted him as he stepped into her cell.

Azula's smile intensified as the councilor entered her cell."Hello again. I'm ready for a nice, long chat."

13132.content:
Mai needed to sit down. Freeing the messenger hawk from her grasp, she read over the note once again to make sure she understood it correctly.

"Is that a message for Zuko?" Zuko's mother, Ursa, strode across the sizable courtyard of the Fire Nation's royal palace to see what was bothering who she guessed would be her future daughter-in-law. Banished from the fire kingdom for years for agreeing to assassinate Fire Lord Azulon to avoid having to kill her son Zuko, Ursa had spent her long exile worrying about her son, getting by as a servant at a country inn beyond the Earth Kingdom's borders. She didn't dare attempt to re-enter the fire nation to check up on Zuko, not for fear of her own life but out of concern for what Zuko would do if news of her apprehension reached him. The last thing Ursa wanted was to give Ozai another reason to want to hurt her son.
Zuko restored her position upon becoming Fire Lord. Ursa wasn't worse off for her period in exile, and the only real changes were calloused feet and some weight gain. Her accommodations at the inn were far from fancy but there was always food to go around; Ursa, as bit of a nervous eater, slowly added one hundred pounds to her frame over the course of her exile. Now once again home and clad in form-fitting fire nation robes, Ursa's extremely full chest and wide, motherly hips made her an extremely recognizable figure on the palace grounds.

Mai sighed. "Azula escaped from Crane Isle." The lack of ennui in her voice was testament to her honesty.

Ursa maneuvered her rather large, gently shaking backside next to Mai and sat down next to her underneath a tree."That girl...and Zuko has enough on his mind!" Her face contorted with sadness as she dwelled on what her daughter had become since her exile.

Mai sighed. "Just when things were going nicely for once." Mai truly enjoyed her new life with the royal family. She had been more open with Zuko than anyone else in the world,and his mother was very accepting of her, despite Mai's tendency to make a cold first impression. It could even be said that Mai's life with Zuko was helping her out of her shell; she would sometimes wear her hair down and had become more lenient with herself, even allowing her once carefully watched figure to take on a little extra weight. Most of the roughly 20 pounds seemed to go to her butt, making her behind a more dynamic aspect of her body than her often-stoic face thanks to her lack of a wardrobe update.

Ursa took the message out of Mai's hand. "We should go let him know; the faster, the better, even if he won't like it." Mai stood up and offered a hand to help the very plump woman onto her feet. "You go. I need to get to some fresh messenger hawks. There are others besides Zuko that need to know she's out."

"Good thinking. Don't let this upset you, Mai." Ursa smiled, turned, and headed indoors to the throne room.

"I won't let her change things." Mai said to no one in particular before letting the wind carry the parchment into the air. Mai watched it for a moment, the hurled a throwing dagger through the sheet, nailing it into the courtyard wall with precision.

131321.content:
Within a few hours, a messenger hawk bearing the Fire Lord's insignia had made its way to the Jade Dragon, the tea shop owned by Zuko's uncle Iroh. Unsure if Aang was still in the Earth Kingdom capital of Ba Sing Se, Zuko figured getting the message to Iroh to spread around would be the safest bet.

Iroh received the hawk as he was heating up a row of pleasant-looking teapots for the evening rush with some gentle firebending. Ba Sing Se was a massive city, and the Jade Dragon tea house had a reputation as the best in the world.

"I hear a messenger hawk! If its more royalty askin' for a reservation at my table, tell them its fine as long as they don't expect me to move." Toph Bei Fong was sprawled across the two-person-sized booth closest to the counter in the Jade Dragon, lounging. Not eager to resume her pampered home life, Toph looked for amusement in Ba Sing Se as Aang and the others took slightly more...hands-on approaches to helping rebuild the damage done by the war. Toph thought Iroh was a pretty down to earth guy; he never chastised her for her manners, and Iroh accepted her service to the Avatar as payment enough for a little tea and cake. As such, Toph's bare, rather dirty feet, poking out into view past the table as she reclined, had become almost a fixture at the tea house.

A well dressed Earth Kingdom gentleman of about forty sitting at the table next to Toph's gave an audible snort of displeasure at the girl's manners; he had waited an hour to be seated, and some barefooted little commoner was overstaying at her table! Immediately after the snort, his table was immediately jolted upward by something, flipping his tea onto his head and sending his untouched pastry rocketing into the air. The man strode out of the restaruant, half-crying over the damage done to his dress robes.

Iroh smiled and calmly walked over to the now-vacant table, re-straightening it. The pillar of earth that had shot up underneath the table to jolt it had settled back into its original formation in the floor without a crack out of place. "That messenger hawk actually had some serious news." Iroh began as he picked up the spilled teacup. "...But first, where did that pastry go?"

Toph was now impatient. "Don't worry about it! -Burrrrap!- What did the hawk say?"
"Azula seems to have broken out of the Asylum. I can't help but feel like a regimen of gentle, encouraging therapy was not the best fit for calming my niece down." Iroh mused in his usual pondering tone.

Toph sprung to her feet, a few cake crumbs fall from her clothes. She didn't look much different from four months ago; she stubbornly adhered to the same rather dirty outfit, and still carried with her the slightly strong odor of earth and sweat. All the baked goods she had gobbled up over the months had built up a pooch around her midsection, making her sash pinch her slight potbelly.

"Do you know if the Avatar is still in town?" Iroh asked. "I haven't seen him in a few days."
"I think everyone went to make sure the farms outside of the city limits were doing ok. Sokka said he wanted to go talk to the guy responsible for maintaining the rail system to expand the tracks into smaller towns for ease of travel and junk."

"I'll alert the messenger system that the Avatar is needed back here for a meeting, then." Iroh began walking out of the restaurant. "Wait!" Toph held out her palm to Iroh. She was silent for a moment, then scrunched her toes. "I'd know those footsteps anywhere!"

At that moment Katara burst into the Jade Dragon, out of breath and with one hair loopy undone. "Azula's here! She's fighting Aang in the lower ring!"
131321.title: Mai contacts Aang, Katara, and co.  first.

choices: Toph and Katara wake up later...
1313211.content:
Iroh, Toph, and Katara sprinted out into the city.

"We should take the monorail down, otherwise we'll be running for an hour before we get to the lower ring." Iroh said, bracing himself for a confrontation with Azula.
"That's way too slow! Toph, sensing the approach of a monorail, quickly hopped on and gestured that the others follow. "Get on!"

Katara, who had been sent by Aang to retrieve Toph and Iroh, didn't like that Toph's actions had contradicted her words. Not willing to stay still and put Aang in further danger however, she climbed aboard. "What do you have planned?"

Toph planted her feet on the monorail, and even as the earthbenders staffing it began to slide it forward at his normal speed, Toph pushed her hands outward in a bending motion, launching the vehicle forward with a massive explosion of rock. Toph then turned, and with a look of concentration, brought one of her arms to her waist. She took a deep breath, and as she brought it forward, the monorail track peeled from its track into a much steeper upward angle. The blisteringly fast monorail car shot forward off this improvised ramp, sending the group arcing through the air.

"What now?!" Katara yelled, wondering what Toph had planned for their landing.
"What do you mean what now?! Oh! The land-" The car slammed into the top of a building in the lower ring, sending it spinning across rooftops, demolishing them. Finally, the car hit the street, tearing up pavement, and skidded to a stop on its side. Iroh rolled out of the tram only to find Aang over him, a look of worry on his face. "Iroh! Where are Toph and Katara?!"
Iroh slowly got to his feet, rubbing his back. He took a look inside the compartment and saw....a massive hole in the roof.
----

Azula stood over Katara and Toph, who were extremely dazed from the impact of the monorail and their subsequent kidnapping from the flying vessel.
"I clearly have lost none of my skill through my incarceration." Azula gloated, proud that she had eluded the avatar and intercepted the rogue monorail car with a well placed bolt of lightning. Katara and Toph had fallen from the hole made in the flying car and tumbled helplessly in front of Azula's feet.

"Judging by those vibrations its not what youlostthat you should be worried about." The ever-plucky Toph said replied, somewhat hazily.
Azula scowled. Her massive chest, the equivalent of of a C bust size, quivered slightly. Azula ran a hand down the severe hourglass figure she had developed since her escape from the asylum. Wearing a set of too-tight fire nation robes, Azula was now significantly overweight. The way fat settled on her body only contributed to her regal air, however. Her hips and chest had flared out, giving her a strikingly womanly figure that amplified her domineering presence.
"This body is the result of my practice. I have developed a superior fire-bending discipline, and I believe it is due time I tried it on someone that can bend!"
Katara had just begun to get to her feet when Azula pointed two fingers at her abdomen with a look of concentration in her eyes. Waves of pain and warmth coursed through her body, radiating from her stomach. She felt as if someone had lit a fire in her intestines.

"Now, BURN!" Azula yelled, and pointed with her other hand. However, as she extended her arm, a rock flung by Toph's earthbending struck it off course. In a rage, Azula's concentration left Katara, who collapsed with a breathy gasp. Azula repeated the same one-armed motion with Toph, who bit her tongue to stop from crying out at the feeling.
Azula readied her second arm once again, when the shouts of Aang and Iroh grew louder in the distance.

"No! Not before I finish the technique!" Azula, frustrated that she would not be able to kill with her new art until some other day, raised her head to the air and let out a massive belch that resounded through the city streets. Even azula was surprised she did this. As Azula began to run, her chest shaking and thighs jiggling, she murmured to herself "This technique has really been messing with my chi...here's hoping it won't get worse as I hone my abilities." As she had demonstrated in eluding Aang, Azula lost none of her agility with her weight gain; she swiftly abandoned the scene of her crimes. Azula knew she had acted rashly; she would need to victimize more people with her new bending before she would attempt it against the Avatar.
1313211.title: The story continues!

13132111.content:
Katara opened her eyes to find Aang leaning over her, wide eyed. "Katara!"
Katara rose to a sitting position and wrapped her arms around Aang. He had brought her and Toph to rest at the nearest upper ring hotel while they called for anyone with some healing knowledge. Her dirty robe had been removed, leaving her clad in her white skirt and tank-top that were layered over the wrappings that served as her undergarments.

Katara felt a pang of guilt; clearly that strange technique made it look like she was killed, at least for a few seconds. "I'm sorry if I scared you. I'm not in pain...Azula just knocked me out. I feel fine." The sound of Katara's stomach suddenly became audible; it was growling loudly. "Well, maybe I am hungry, I guess I was out for a while, huh?" she put a hand behind her head, blushing a little. She had the strongest urge to eat her weight in chocolate; she wondered if she had been unconscious for more than a day to work up such a ravenous appetite. Her stomach gave another roar as she slipped on a clean blue robe.

Aang raised an eyebrow. "Actually Katara....its only been ten minutes."
Katara double-taked. "Really?!"
"Well, that's the thing Katara..."
Aang took a glass of water off a stone night table next to the bed. "Try bending this water."
Katara extended a hand and scooped upward, trying to get the water to mimic the movement. Nothing. Katara gasped. "Oh no....that technique takes away bending!"
Her mind settled on the feeling of helplessness that had washed over her when Ty Lee had blocked her chi, disabling her waterbending.

Aang scratched his head. "Well...not exactly!" He grinned, trying to cheer Katara up.

-------
"I would have paid that nutjob to mess with my bending like this!" Toph was effortlessly terraforming miniature mountains and sending baseball-sized chunks of earth zipping around her head in the middle of the street of Ba Sing Se. Being a sprawling cityscape, the inhabitants of the bustling capital were very used to roadblocks, and the slightly jaded populace quickly re-routed around the street Toph was practicing on. Every few moments or so, she would earth-surf back to a table filled with various sweets and shove a slice of cake or a roll into her mouth.

"So Toph got her bending back after she ate?" Aang had brought Katara down to street level to observe Toph, who had woken up before her and immediately demanded some food. "Yeah!" Aang replied, glad to see hope back in Katara's voice. Katara stepped outside, which Toph immediately noticed. With good cheer and energy, Toph called out to her friend. "Hey sweetness, go scarf down something to eat, your bending'll come back with a vengeance!" Toph made her flying rocks do a fighter-jet style formation to emphasize.
"That's great!" Katara rushed off to the Inn's dining room before Aang could stress one very troubling point; Toph had cleared her steak dinner in the five minutes longer Katara was unconscious for, and clearly she was still hungry enough to have a table loaded with pastries brought out to her.....

Katara walked up to the person talking orders at the Inn and smiled. "I would like some fried roosterpig....oooh with a side of potatoes....extra butter...oh! and for dessert , some chocolate mousse!" Katara giggled a little to herself and put a hand to her thigh, her way of expressing that vague "I shouldn't, this will go right to my thighs, but what the heck!" feeling that many image-conscious young ladies grapple with after yielding to some calorie-laden temptation.

---
As her food was brought over to her, Katara felt fantastic, downright elated. The smell was almost maddeningly attractive, and before she knew it she was snatching the slices of rich, juicy meat from the plate with her bare fingers and gulping them down two at a time. She began shoveling mashed potatoes into her mouth with a spoon, but in a hurry to pack more flavor and more food into each bite, she had dumped her chocolate mousse into her potatoes and began eating the combination. It didn't matter if the butter and chocolate tasted strange with each other, what mattered was that she was eating !

Not bothering to wipe her hands or mouth, she dashed up to the counter and ordered a duplicate meal. She tapped her foot anxiously; her first meal only seemed to intensify her appetite...

After her sixth meal Katara realized she could waterbend the milkshakes she ordered, but she wasn't content. Not only was she fairly certain her bending would disappear again if she was on an empty stomach, but she was also sure she was physically incapable of feeling totally full. Sure, she felt a little better, but her hunger pangs were still an itch; the pounds of greasy food she had consumed had only served to dull the pangs from a scratch. The armpits of her robes had grown damp, and sweat dotted her forehead from her ravenous eating. Grease stains dotted her robe, and her fingers were absolutely covered in food and oil. Her stomach was round and bloated, but still she felt like she could go for another meal. In fact, the thought of another round of fried meat set her mouth watering. "What did Azula do to us...Toph?!"

Toph had entered the inn's restaurant again and was at the counter ordering more food, her stuffed belly extremely noticeable on her tiny frame, even through her robes. She simply held up four fingers on one hand, and within a few minutes four whole cowhippo steaks, each one the size of Toph's head (hairdo included!), were being brought out from the kitchen. "Freshly imported from the fire nation, miss Bei Fong!" the staff member placing the food before Toph remarked.

Katara realized Toph must be going through the exact same thing as her. Katara got to her feet, wobbling a little at the extra weight now centered in her gut, and ran over to her. She approached Toph as close as she could without hitting her in the face with her distended gut. "Toph! Whatever Azula's done to us has made us food addicts! I can't get full, and I think we'll lose our bending if we don't pig out all the time!"

Toph had grabbed a steak with both hands and was slowly wrenching a chunk of dripping meat off the bone. With her mouth absolutely full, she turned to Katara and shrugged. "So?" she said in an offhand tone, grease spraying from her lips and into her friend's face.
13132111.title: Toph and Katara wake up later...

131321111.content:
Three days had passed since Azula had attacked Toph and Katara with whatever strange bending technique she had perfected while locked away. Many healers and academics had examined the girls, but none seemed to come close to finding the root of the girls' need to overeat, nor why this compulsion seemed to directly affected their bending abilities.

"Toph, wake up!" Katara flicked a finger, sending a small but fast moving jet of water launching from a nearby pitcher into Toph's face. "Wha!Blch, pah!" Toph sat upright in her hotel bed, using her hands to help herself into the position. Toph had as usual neglected to bathe or change out of her robes, preferring instead to heave herself onto her bed and fall asleep. Katara had just finished a breakfast consisting of twenty-five fried eggs, a whole roast pig, and enough toast to comprise an entire loaf of bread (Which was slathered in over three sticks worth of butter.), so her bending was feeling fine...well, was. Already she felt fatigued and desperate for more food, and she had only walked up the stairs since she ate!

"I see little miss 'I can't eat like this anymore' has been stuffing her face!" sang a triumphant Toph as she wiped the water that had been bended at her off her face. "I only had a little snack!" Katara sharply replied, crossing her arms. "Little snacks aren't bending fuel." Toph patted her stomach, which had swollen outward since her binging began. Toph hopped out of bed, not looking as if she was going to shower or change her clothes. "I've gotta get me some meat!" Toph licked her lips and began trotting past Katara. Katara saw Toph's gut shaking in her robes as she left; she had clearly put on at least fifteen pounds. Everything about her was chunkier. Katara noticed how full Toph's face was becoming, and how seriously her belly was developing over such a short timespan; already Toph had developed a bulging potbelly that squished into tables when she sat down to devour pound after pound of guilty pleasures. Katara figured if Toph kept up her piglike eating habits, it wouldn't be long before she had to waddle to get around! Katara sighed and followed her friend down to the hotel restaurant; like it or not,she could also go for some food.
Katara sat across from Toph at the restaurant. "Looking for another 'little snack', madam fussybritches?" Toph grinned at Katara.
"No, I'm just here to talk to you about your overeating!" Katara growled.
"It's not overeating if you never feel full!" Toph shot back quickly.

Help from the hotel's staff quickly approached the ladies with a smile; the establishment had been gifted with all of the payment for the food they had served to Toph and Katara, thanks to the economic free reign Zuko had granted them. Toph and Katara were now valued patrons, and in this particular restaurant manager's eyes, his path to early retirement. "So, what will it be?" He asked with a smile.

"Don't you normally place orders up front first?" Katara asked. The manager waved a hand. "I'm willing to make an exception for you fine young ladies! You are most valued customers." That was all Toph needed. "Sweet, can I get a couple of roast pigs, about six dozen raw eggs, ummm, some pie, apple I guess...no....blueberry...umm just bring me all of the pie you've got, and a muffin." Toph was already rubbing her flabby gut, eager to have it feel full for a fleeting second or two.

"And for you?" The waiter turned to Katara for a smile.
"Nothing for me, please." Katara daintily waved her hand. "...Just a fifty egg omelet."
"Oh, of course!
"....with sausage."
"Will that be all?"
"Yup!" Katara nodded. "That's it, just that and like, a brick of chocolate if you have it."
"P-pardon me?"
"Well, you guys serve chocolate right? Just a tiny brick-like sliver please."
"....I'm sure that can be arranged, I guess..." the manager said, not wanting to offend his gluttonous guests. "Well, I'll just bring your orders up to the kitchen..."

"Hold it!" Toph held out a hand in the manager's general direction. "Listening to her order worked up my appetite, bring out a bunch of cowhippo steaks too."
"Steaks? At this hour? I'm sure that can be arranged but how many should I bring?"
"Whatever you can manage." Toph flatly replied.
"But we have a whole team of chefs, that much steak would feed the entire restaruant! It'll be too much!"
Toph snorted in laughter. "Bahahahaha!"
"So how many did you say you wanted?" The manager put a hand to his face in exasperation.
Katara sighed. "She's not kidding...bring them all out.....if she doesn't finish them all, I will...." Her voice dripped with disappointment at herself. Katara leaned her head into her hand, propping it up over the table.
131321111.title: The story continues!

choices: Katara tries to organize the trip to see Ty Lee...
1313211111.content:
The meal arrived shortly after, and the girls had a field day. Katara would have liked to think she was more refined than Toph, but she ate exactly the same way: as if she were a starved wanderer who had spotted her first food in a week. Toph still managed to put away her food faster than Katara, however. For one thing, Toph was a big eater. If Katara was sure an amount of food would fit down her throat, it was too small a bite for Toph. Taking her eggs after some tentative feeling around, she cracked three dozen into a large wooden bowl, twirled the mass of protein and fat around a bit with her hand, then drank it in one monstrous chug. Toph regularly ordered eggs throughout her meal and treated this style of eating them as a beverage. Katara was indeed served a brick of chocolate, and after slapping Toph's hand away from it, greedily immersed herself in rich, creamy, sugar-laden bliss for a few perfect moments. By the end of the meal, both girls hands and faces were covered in food, and neither seemed altogether full, despite their five (six for Toph, who squeezed in an extra one, having lapped Katara in eating pace once) courses and swollen bellies.

"Toph, I have -urp-" Katara covered her mouth and tried to quietly expel the gas. "...I have an idea! While I was eating my chocolate-"
"I can't believe you didn't let me have a few bites of that!" Toph shook her fist at Katara.
"Nevermind the choco-brick, for the last time! I realized that I had experienced this kind of problem before; Ty Lee was able to block my chi by striking my pressure points! Maybe she could help diagnose our problem!"

"What problem? Its a new preference, if anything." Toph's bare belly button was poking out from her green robes, stretched and distended from her massive meal. "Buuuuuuraaaap!" An extremely loud and rather deep sounding belch issued from her tiny, yet bloated body. Katara pinched her nose.

"How can you be so cool with all of this?!" Katara shouted, her voice odd sounding with her nose pinched.
Toph struggled to her feet. "This is how! I get to stuff myself silly all day long," Toph raised one hand. The sound of ground being uprooted and launched accompanied by varied screams of surprise from outside the inn were heard. "and what happens? My bending becomes more powerful!" Toph grabbed Katara's arm and pulled her to her feet. Katara let out an "uuugh...." As her stomach rubbed against the table and shook a bit from the rapid movement. Her eyes were half-closed with lethargy from the meal.

"Feel me!" Toph demanded of Katara.
"Wha?!" Katara's eyes shot open, no longer dazed.
"Touch my gut! See how much fat I've got there now? Now all of the vibrations I feel with my feet travel also shake up my gut! This must be how people feel when they get a new pair of glasses! All of the vibrations I feel are amplified and sharpened! And now, the rest of me is starting to get flabby! I'll be able to see even better!"

"Well that's good for you Toph but I-" Katara grabbed her left arm with her right hand, clearly embarrassed.
"Stop being so self-conscious. You can't lie to me and say you don't like it, I'm the same as you! You'll actually have fun with this if you don't grudge yourself a couple of pounds!"
Toph extended a hand to pat Katara's big belly, but to her surprise, it was surprisingly small! Even with the swelling caused by her meal, Toph's hands detected a relatively slender waist wrapped with a thin layer of fat. "Wait a sec; my vibrations don't lie, what's going on here?"

Katara tried to pull away from the little girl that was currently groping her, but she was stronger than she looked. "If not there...." Toph mused to herself before putting her greasy hands onto Katara's chest, causing her to jump as she began to squeeze. "No...definitely bigger, but not what I'm lookin' for..."

"TOPH! Stopthatthisinstant" Katara half yelled, half whispered, trying to find a pitch that would outline her severity but wouldn't draw the attention of the others dining in the hotel restaurant.

"Just a second sweetness, I'm trying to find why your vibrations are so big....ooooh, duh!" Toph grinned. Her hand shot downward to Katara's waist, and clamped down on the round, jiggly flesh that was Katara's rear end. Katara had gained at least 20 pounds over the last few days, and almost all of it had gone to her hips. Her robe was now fighting to cover a maternal looking pear shape. The garment was stretched rather taught over her body. "You don't need to be able to see to imagine what you look like in motion, sweet cheeks!"

Katara had blushed so severely that Toph almost saw it. ".......We. are. going. to. see. Ty. Lee." Katara shoved Toph away from her and stormed out of the restaurant.
"That's it sweet cheeks! Work those vibrations!" Toph shouted after her gleefully, wiggling her toes and enjoying Katara's discomfort immensely.
1313211111.title: The girls chow down!

13132111111.content:
Katara spent the next day examining maps and sending out messenger hawks. By the evening, the responsible young water bender had organized her and Toph's trip to Kyoshi Island. Not wanting to deprive Aang of Appa or bring him along on an errand that could compromise how quickly he could respond to a report of Azula or some other issue that needed the Avatar's attention, she decided that Aang would see them to the coast of the Earth Kingdom, and from there a ship would be ready and waiting to take them to the island itself.

"...and once we are there, we'll see if Ty Lee can help clear our Chi. Also, the sea voyage will force Toph and I ration our food, so maybe we'll lose a little weight,even if we're only going to be sailing for a few days!" Katara maneuvered her fleshy rear back to the her booth in the Jade Dragon, smiling at the chocolate cake and milk that was waiting for her. "Sounds like a plan, Katara!" Aang tried to sound enthusiastic to her without sounding too enthusiastic. The last thing he needed was Katara picking up "subtle" (read: non-existent in Aang's case) messages that he was eager to see her slim down or stop eating so feverishly. "I'm going to go do that stuff you asked me to...no, don't worry, I remember it all!" Aang waved and exited the tea shop, a little glad he didn't have to watch the girls scarf down food anymore...it was getting a little boring.

Katara knew she and Toph just weren't getting any thinner staying in Ba Sing Se. The combined sensation of starvation and the feelings of insecurity that came with blocked bending was hard to willingly accept, especially with the waves of elation that eating provided and the effortless bending that came afterward.

"That works out perfectly!" Toph declared as she spooned heaps of sugar into her tea. Katara's chocolate-smudged lips popped into an appreciative smile. Toph continued "...With you cutting back, I can eat your extra portions! Balances perfectly." Toph grinned, clearly satisfied with her flawless logic.
"Well Toph, there isn't going to be any extra! What I've ordered for the ship is what we've got." She only just finished the sentence when her stomach growled, unsure why her system was no longer being flooded with cake. Katara resumed eating.

"There better be a second ship's worth of food then! There ain't no way I'm going to eat anything less than thirty squares a day!" Toph looked genuinely agitated, and began pouring sugar directly into her mouth, skipping the liquid middleman. "Toph, we need to cut back! I think I've gained another five pounds just today. You're so much smaller and you eat as much, maybe even more than I do!"

Toph nearly growled at Katara.
"Look. I gave you my reasons. Yeah, I'm gettin' chunky. Yes, its harder for me to walk. But I can see so much better, and my bending is getting so effortless that I don't even know if I want to go ahead and get this Goofy Acrobat Punching Cure you are banking on."
Katara looked a little frightened. "Toph, if we let this keep changing us, who knows what we'll look like in another week, another month!"

Toph licked a finger to get at a few rogue grains of sugar inside the container as she transitioned into her trademark sarcastic tone. "Ok, so we buy new robes with the money we'll be making bending mountains and rainstorms with our pinkies" Toph put her feet up on the table to recline, her gut, now almost level with her head, hid half of her face . "But I won't make you take the trip alone, sweet cheeks. I'll go with you."

Katara unclenched a little and resumed her cake eating, figuring it would be easier to convince Toph after their mini-diet. "Thank you Toph." Katara murmured, spraying a few chocolate crumbs at her feet.
"Just...lemme know the name of the ship?" Toph inquired.
------------
Katara had just gotten a gander full of their ship's cargo. The ship was set to sail in ten minutes, and Toph had arranged a few changes in provisions.

"I can't believe you!" Katara screeched, bringing her head face to face with Toph, forcing her rear end into an extremely conspicuous position. Toph rested one hand on her corpulent stomach, which was starting to conspicuously attract the attention of gravity. "A girl's gotta eat!"

Katara glanced again at Toph's replacement provisions. "Pot after pot of oil, bricks of blubber, what looks like a ton of butter, milk, sugar, garlic, and that's it! We can't just eat this stuff for two days straight!" Katara's arms shot to her hips. Her fists dug into her fleshy sides.

Toph, round faced and thick-armed, rubbed her hands together, sending her upper body into small shakes. "Well, I probably can, but I know that Katara. You're going to waterbend and fish us as many elephant coy as we want; we are perfectly supplied for a two day fish fry that will go down in history!"

"But, but..." Katara noticed she was now spraying drool in Toph's face as she objected. Toph didn't flinch at this. In fact, she smiled, aware that Katara's body had surrendered their argument on her behalf.
13132111111.title: Katara tries to organize the trip to see Ty Lee...

131321111111.content:
"Enjoying yourself?" Toph noticed Katara had gone silent next to her, and that her breathing had grown very calm. Rapidly tapping her foot, and imagining the rocky shore of the earth kingdom shrinking and disappearing as their ship moved ponderously out to sea, Toph struggled to be nearly as comfortable as Katara. Her excess flab made things better than her last sea voyage however, and the vibrations of the wood and metal of the ship provided meager but adequate vision. The bottom line was that nothing beat solid ground for Toph, and her decreased perception led to increased attention to her hunger pangs.

"Yeah...it's always good to get out to sea every once and a while. You don't need to see to enjoy it Toph, just take a deep breath and relax."
"I'll start taking 'deep breaths' when all we can smell is sizzling butter!" Toph licked her lips and gave Katara's rear a slap. There was a visible response to the stimulus at the site of impact. "Get bending!" She exclaimed.
"Would you cut that out? I'm hungry too!" Katara grudgingly glanced around and elegantly sent a few smaller elephant Koi onto the deck. "Ok, these will be yours; we need you full so you can bend us up a seafood feast!" Toph quickly (though slightly unstably) retrieved some butter and a massive pan, and with a quick fire the fish fry had begun.

Katara ate the first serving and was soon hurling massive catches onto the deck, which Toph aggressively prepared. Toph's robes quickly became a mess as she dropped whole bricks of blubber into the frying pan, coating the fish until it was a sinful, greasy slab twice its normal size. Everything below Toph's nose was pressed into the fish as she tore into each and every morsel, spitting bones over the deck. It wasn't long before she stopped trying to wipe her face and just left grease perpetually dripping off her chin. As she finished her fifth elephant Koi about two hours later, Toph came to the shocking realization that Katara hadn't eaten a bite since her first snack! "Katara? Don't you want some?"

Katara sounded as if she were crying. "No, I'm fine."
Toph realized what she had been doing; making a complete and utter pig of herself and scaring Katara away from indulging. "Your bending is going to get worse if you don't eat!" Toph reasoned. Katara was silent for a moment. "I'll...just get one more out, then that will be it for me." Toph nearly gagged at the thought of only having a single Koi for the day. "Ok, but first get five more for me! I'm still hungry!" Toph insisted.

Katara sighed. "Ok Toph...can't have you going hungry, I guess..." she muttered dejectedly.
---
When Katara had retrieved six bulky Koi, over the next half hour, she gloomily turned to face a meal she knew would leave her stomach howling in agony all night. To her surprise, Toph was standing guard over not one, but six fried fish. "I'm not going to eat these." Toph said resolutely. Katara couldn't believe her ears. "What?! You, not want to eat? Is the chi-block wearing off?" Her voice raised slightly with hope. Toph gave Katara a little punch on the arm. "No, I want to eat all of these then lick the grease off the deck of the ship, but you need to eat it more, Katara! You'll be cured when we get to Kyoshi, I'm sure, but you helped Aang save the world, and you shouldn't be torturing yourself like this! You should be happy! You should be enjoying yourself!"

"....Toph....." Katara bend down and gave the plump earthbender a hug...saturating the front of her robes in grease. Toph promptly shoved Katara off (with a little less force than her usual shoves) and pointed in the direction of the food's smell. She soon heard Katara quietly but rabidly tearing into the food. In a single hour, she was done.

"-Burrap-" Katara let out a satisfied belch and got to her feet. She sounded much happier, but something was unstable about her voice, as if she wasn't going to take no for an answer to her next question. "Up for seconds Toph?"
"Am I ever!!" Toph took off towards the hull to retrieve more butter.

The smell of frying fish wafted from the ship several hours past sunset.
131321111111.title: The girls set sail!

1313211111111.content:
Sunrise woke the girls up. Both had collapsed onto the deck in a food-induced coma after dozens upon dozens of fried elephant koi."Oh man...we hit the fish pretty hard last night...I feel like there's agni kai going on in my gut!" Toph put a hand behind her head and welcomed the morning with a loud, cloying belch.
Katara got to her feet. "Same." She took a step,stopped, blushed heavily, and fanned by her backside with one hand. "We're gross....lets get out of these robes in our cabin." Katara said quickly, making sure Toph was always in front of her.

------
Katara and Toph had been assigned a reasonably large cabin with four beds. As they entered, they began to notice things. "Katara, do you feel a little...bloated? Burrrap" Toph lethargically asked. Toph was no longer just a pudgy kid; she looked as if she had a bulging feed bag stuffed underneath her robes. Maternal instincts kicking in, Katara bent down and popped Toph's belt out of its notch. Toph gave a moan of relief as her belly surged forward. Shedding her robe to reveal her half-length cloth pants and yellow tank-top like wrappings, the full extent of her girth could be observed. It could be argued that Toph would have weighed in at less than 90 pounds before her weight gain, but now she was hedging 130.
"Woah!" Katara's hand went to her nose. "Toph, when was the last time you bathed?" She began fanning.
"I got caught in a rainstorm like three weeks ago." Toph raised her arms up a little. "Kinda funky?" She sniffed her own armpit.
" All that belching you are doing isn't helping either." Toph smelled of damp earth, sweat, and grease of both the hair and food variety. The cabin was filled with her body odor upon her disrobing, and was virtually impossible to ignore.

As Toph smelled different parts of herself to validate these claims, Katara couldn't help but gape at how large she had become in such a short time.
Her cheeks, spreading outward, finally framed her face in a permanent double chin after last night's binge. Her arms were thick and wide, further adding to the roundness of her figure. Her pants were clearly tight on her, and had ridden up to expose chubby knees. All of Toph's figure seemed to have thickened to better support her tummy, which was exposed. Her stomach was fair-skinned and massively weighty; thick creases in Toph's back fat indicated a significant downward force. Her gut was loose and jiggly, no longer a circular potbelly. Hanging down to her mid-thighs, Toph's excess flesh was becoming significantly apron-shaped. Her belly button was now at waist-level, with a "U" shape of flesh extending further downward, her belly forming a secondary roll. Toph's body batted against her stomach as she walked, sending her gut shaking with movement. Katara knew her friend was now undeniably significantly out of shape, weighty, and rather slow.

Toph finished sniffing a lock of her hair. "Ok, ok, so I kind of reek." Toph stuck her finger in her left nostril to clear an obstruction. "Though I've smelled you firsthand after you work up a sweat, sugar queen!"

Katara gently pulled off her filthy robe, making further visible her dark blue stretch pants and revealing her white chest wrappings with a similarly colored half-body top similar to Toph's over them. Katara's darker flesh could be seen between the wrappings, forming noticeable cleavage.

Toph immediately noticed a change in the stagnant air.
Katara blushed and gave her left armpit and experimental sniff. Her facial expression went from questioning to one best described as "yikes." Katara was known to work up a sweat rather quickly, and while she found it useful for emergency waterbending at times, she had yet to find a positive application of the stinky pits that quickly joined her perspiration. On top of that, Katara's stomach was roiling painfully with gas from her deep fried gluttony.

"No wonder you are so concerned about staying all ladylike, once you start sweating you are absolutely ripe!" Toph laughed."So, what's the damage?" She slapped her stomach, which triggered a brief but baritone belch from the depths of her belly.


"The damage?" Katara crossed her arms, getting another potent whiff of herself in the process. Then it hit her; she ate as much as Toph last night!
Katara, being taller and older than her friend, was likely nearing 175 pounds. Her own glistening tea-colored belly, dripping with sweat, was beginning to remind her of the way Toph looked when she started showing weight. "Oh boy..." Katara cupped her new spare tire in both hands and shook it, then gulped and felt down her hips. Sure enough, her ass had spread significantly; Katara realized that both sides of her hips had brushed the cabin door coming in. Her stretch pants still covered her quite comfortably, but it was clear her rear end had begun a process like Toph's belly; it was now leaving a roundness stage to become more wide and oval-like. Katara felt the cheeks lifting and dropping as she walked now. The sensation vibrated through her body, making Katara mentally assign a "ka-clunk! ka-clunk!" noise to it. Katara's face slightly rounded, and her arms were thickening different from Toph's; while Toph's were more wide and shapely, Katara's flab hung and shook more the the limb, unable to mold around a sliver of muscle tone. Katara's body was now significant pear with a bit of extra chest weight. "...the damage is...predicable...." Katara murmured.


"Now, I remember having tons of fun last night, do you?" Toph interrogated.
Katara frowned. "Yeah...it was fun...." She couldn't lie to herself; she had a blast.

"Then why not have one more girls' night before Ty Lee fixes us both!" Toph suggested. Katara lit up. "You'll do it? That's great!" If I pig out one last time, Toph will get cured with me!" she thought.
"If Katara has more fun tonight, she won't want to get rid of this either!" Toph thought.

Toph grew serious quickly after this, however. "Now, one more thing has been bugging me. We're both being open here, so just let it go!"

Katara looked puzzled. "What are you talking about?"
Toph smiled. "I won't think you are any less of a lady, just do it!"

Katara looked nervous for a moment, then looked up, gathered her courage, leaned to one side, and ripped a mammoth fart in the confined quarters. Katara was pretty sure the temperature in the cabin rose a few degrees. "heh....pardon me?" She nervously blushed.
"How long were you holding that in?" Toph questioned, letting a smaller fart of her own rip.
"My whole life, really!" said Katara, nervously giggling.

"Feels good right? Forget a change of clothes, lets get cooking now, I'm starving!" Toph began to heft herself out of the cabin with her exposed gut.
Katara moved toward the door, the idea of another day of gluttony intoxicating her and evaporating her inhibitions. "Just watch out Toph, that meal is still digesting!" She gave a small, audible fart to emphasize her volatility. Toph laughed. "Ditto, sweet cheeks,and we're about to refuel!" Both were salivating.

13132111111111.content:
The Kyoshi Warriors had only just finished their forms for the day when they received news that a non-trading ship had arrived at Kyoshi Island. Ty Lee and Suki were both aware that Azula had escaped from her incarceration, making this report more attention-grabbing than similar ones in the past. Ty Lee began wiping off her warrior facepaint with her sleeve after hearing the news. "Ty Lee? We need to go investigate, don't start to undress!" Suki was used to a certain degree of ditzy behavior from the Kyoshi Warriors' newest member, but even she couldn't have missed the possible implications of an unannounced ship's arrival. "It's not Azula." Ty Lee replied with all certainty. Suki crossed her arms. ""What makes you so sure?" Ty lee extended a hand out a nearby window. "Look. Do you hear screams? Anything on fire? Its not like she can be stealthy after her face has been plastered up and down the world as an overthrown tyrant." Ty Lee smilingly waved her arms dramatically to emphasize the scope of her claim. "Say, I don't need to keep this armor on when we go into an actual fight right? All this clothing makes me feel so bottled up." Ty Lee effortless flipped herself into a one-armed handstand. "See? Look at how all this armor just hangs off me!" Suki decided not to fight this particular battle (...again) and began a more practical line of conversation. "So if its not Azula, who is it, and what are they doing here at Kyoshi?"

--------------

Toph and Katara had disembarked from the ship after another feast. Both had changed their clothes afterward for the sake of appearances, but already the armpits of Toph's robes were saturated with sweat, and Katara was quietly moaning with displeasure at the pounds of fried fish she had heaped into her stomach just an hour ago. "Oooh....Toph....you can still smell me through the robe, can't you?....and we only made ourselves worse with that second binge....boy that was silly of us, eating like that right until we saw the island..."

Toph was in high spirits having set foot on solid earth once again. "Dumb of us? You probably would have eaten that dockworker if we didn't have that little snack. I'm with ya on the gas thing, though. -URRRUUURP!- Phew." After Toph's belch, the sounds of commotion were heard down the street. "I-I think I heard a fire catapult being launched!" a merchant shrieked.

Katara and Toph had only grown plumper from their second feast; Katara's rear was marching a step behind her feet, plastered against her once loose robe, and Toph's flowing green shirt could be seen through her poorly-belted outer robe, which was simply under too much strain to fully wrap around her midsection. While the very loose second layer of her outfit still covered Toph's body nicely, her green shirt was known to ride up when she was sitting down, resulting in an exposed bellybutton resting in a layer of fat.

Katara put her hands together and squeezed. "This is so bad....we can't let Ty Lee and Suki see us like this, they've been training all the time while we've been sitting around and pigging out!" Toph, trailing behind Katara, realized her anxious friend had passed gas again for the fourth time since they disembarked a few minutes ago. After taking a moment to remind herself that she was not insane and Katara was at the moment indeed overweight and rather flatulent, Toph gave her two cents. "Well, they expect this sort of thing outta me Katara, and its not like you are going to get any thinner without their help. Just go back to what you were doing before and hold your gas in until you get the fix you want so bad."

Katara blushed as she earnestly responded to Toph. "It feels so good that I don't know if I could go back to doing that perfectly! It'll be pretty uncomfortable..."
"I'm liking you more every day, sugar queen." Toph jested.
"Lets just stay at an inn now and go up to the Kyoshi Warriors tomorrow." Katara suggested, hoping her stomach would be settled by then.
13132111111111.title: Perhaps a little too much indulgence...

131321111111111.content:
Katara and Toph located a two-story, 8 room inn that was far enough from the harbor not to be filled with sailors but not quite close enough inland to be in eyeshot of the large statue of Avatar Kiyoshi and the temple that stood beyond it. Katara approached the owner of the inn, an old woman bent behind a wooden desk, returning keys to their proper cubby holes. The innkeeper had no difficulty noticing their arrival without being able to see the front door.

-Sniff- -Sniff- "What in Kiyoshi's name is that smell? and the floorboards are shaking!"
Katara was blushing crimson as the old woman stood upright and saw that she had patrons.
"Oh! Customers! I'm sure the smell and the quill that just fell off the desk are just in my head, don't you worry dearie!"

Katara was no less mortified after this "encouragement". "...One room for two, please." Katara averted her eyes and kept her arms to her sides, desperately embarrassed by her current state.

-------

"So, we're all settled in; guess we should get cleaned up for our visit tomorrow!" Katara's rear rose and fell through the blue fabric of her robe as she advanced towards their washroom. Toph noted how thunderous each of Katara's footfalls were on the wooden floors and figured Katara's clothes were likely growing as tight as her own, albeit in different places.
Toph threw herself onto her bed, shaking the posts a bit. "Well, we should eat first. We'll be starving in an hour and its no use washing up if we're just going to get all dirty again."
Katara stopped and turned to face Toph. The faint sound of her rear brushing against a wall was audible. "Sounds like a plan. We should get something light."

-----

Katara and Toph lay on the floor of their room with their robes open, overstuffed stomachs bugling upward and outward. Bowls that used to contain rice spread out in a sea around them, licked clean.
Katara groaned. "Toph...I think this chi-block thing is getting worse...its like I can't even help myself when I start thinking of food..."

Toph seemed to be on the verge of fainting from a meal that consisted entirely of fried rice.
"Katara, I'll go get this fixed, I'll do whatever you say, just please, oh please, rub my stomach....I ate....way.. too much....and believe me sugar queen that is saying something."

Katara belched, wiped flecks of rice and drool off her mouth, grabbed hold of her hotel bed, and heaved herself to a sitting position. "Wow, you really are out of it, huh?" Lethargically waddling on her knees over to Toph, knocking discarded bowls aside, she began kneading Toph's distended stomach. It was clear Toph had eaten beyond capacity more than Katara, but all of the fat that had collected around her stomach made Toph soft and doughy to the touch. However, when Katara put pressure on the flabby looking dollop that was Toph's stomach, she could feel a firmness that clearly indicated severe overeating. As she began to press downward, trying to find an application for her healing abilities, Toph sighed with relief, perched her lips, and let out a belch like a dainty woman blowing out a stream of cigarette smoke.

"Ummm.....huh?" A third voice was suddenly audible in the room.
Katara whipped her head around to find Ty Lee's head poking through the window of their second-floor room. "Ty Lee?!" Katara gasped. "Wait, TY LEE?" Katara forced her robes closed, realizing that not only was she fresh from pigging out, but that she had been perspiring towards the end of the meal out of effort and continued to perspire out of the exertion of rubbing Toph's stomach.

Toph put both hands on her exposed stomach. "This isn't what it looks like, ok?" Toph seemed thoughtful for a moment. "Wait....what does this even look like?"

Ty Lee lifted herself into the room, clad in her favorite red acrobat robes. She was in perfect shape as always, not an ounce of fat on her frame aside from her rather full breasts. "I dunno, actually. Maybe the island had an eating contest, and you guys won? a couple times maybe?"
Katara pulled her robe around herself tighter, noting that even it had sweat stains under the armpits and at her chest. "No! Ty Lee, I'm sorry you had to see us like this, but we came here because we need your help! Wait, first, why are you here anyway?!"

Toph clicked her tongue thoughtfully. "Actually Katara, you n' me could probably completely clean out an eating contest...."

Katara huffed in exasperation. "Toph, Let Ty Lee talk!"

Ty Lee took a few steps into the room, smiling. "Oh, well the Kiyoshi warriors and Suki were getting all anxious over reports of young girls appearing in town, but I know Azula well enough to know that something would definitely be blown up by now if she was here. So I kinda shrugged off watch duty for the night, asked around town, and here we are! Say, you guys are Toph and Katara right? I fell on my head a few times trying to do my routine in Kiyoshi armor....were you guys always this fat and sweaty?" Ty Lee asked this of the girls earnestly, completely free of guile or insult.

Katara explained what happened with Azula to Ty Lee, blushing all the while. "....and that is why we look like this....I really need to wash up I know, its just that we just arrived and we had something to eat first and...."

Ty Lee interrupted Katara's self-flagellating excuses. "It's fine! I mean, I think you guys look fine, like if we were to go out together you'd definitely drive so much attention my way! Not that I think you're not pretty, though! And hey, don't worry about the smell, I was a circus acrobat! I spent-so- much time around circus animals I barely even noticed you guys!"

Katara put both hands to her softening face. "Enough! We're going to the temple, we'll tell you what Azula did to us, and you will reverse it and stop this!"
Ty Lee didn't see why Katara was so stressed. "M'kay! Nice seeing you guys again, I forgot to add!" Ty Lee put her hands on her hips and beamed at her friends.
131321111111111.title: The girls get a surprise at the Inn!

1313211111111111.content:
Toph had slung her yellow tunic's belt over her shoulder halfway through their journey to the temple; her stomach was bulging outward enough to make even the first notch aggravatingly tight. The garment now flowed open, revealing her green shirt and the upper portion of her identically dyed pants. Unlike her robe, her green shirt was icing-blotch and grease stain free, having enjoyed the protection of her tunic for all of her previous meals. Katara, noticing Toph's wardrobe alteration, noted that many of the flaps and folds that used to indicate the looseness of Toph's undershirt had disappeared, the extra fabric being employed by her gut. Katara herself was dreading their arrival; Suki was far less airheaded than Ty Lee, and would surely be disturbed at how porcine she was becoming. Katara also knew she had begun to get used to breaking wind freely around Toph. She wouldn't be so rude around Suki and Ty Lee, but being able to vent her nearly constant stomachaches, even if it was a barely-audible little belch, was starting to become one of life's little pleasures for Katara. The young waterbender shook her head a little as they approached Kiyoshi Temple. "Thank goodnessi'm being cured...I seriously think this chi block scrambles your thoughts..." she considered.

Ty Lee had grown impatient by the time she, Katara, and Toph had reached the temple that served as the headquarters for the Kiyoshi Warriors. Arguably the most physically fit young lady that Aang had come into contact with during his journeys, her swift and fluid walking pace quickly outstripped her companions, who were moving even more sluggishly than their overweight frames would suggest due to the heaps of rice they had devoured just moments before setting out.

The main training hall of the temple was empty but lit. "Wait, Ty Lee, why aren't there any guards over Kiyoshi's relics?"
Ty Lee grinned. "I already told you, I skipped out on watch duty today! Now, you said Azula did this?" Ty Lee mimed the motions Katara had demonstrated back at the Inn. Katara nodded, her chin retracting into the softness of her face a little. "That's good, just the last strike was much harder than the first few, and that second pointed strike sort of went in a downwards arc."

Ty Lee attempted it again, effortlessly converting Katara's vague terms into their closest chi-blocking counterparts. She was a little impressed with Azula. "Y'know I would never would have guessed that this combination of strikes would block someone's chi. Maybe its because she's a bender? I know firebending's supposed to be all stomach-y in its source." Ty Lee wiggled her fingers over her lean and femininely muscular midsection.

"Maybe I should give Firebending a shot, then." Toph gave her belly a proud slap, jiggling the ever-growing bowl of flab beneath her shirt.
Katara then decided she had heard her last fat-positive comment for a long time. "Please, Ty Lee, reverse this now?"
--------

Katara and Toph had stripped off their robes and outer clothes to reveal their midsections and lined up for Ty Lee, who had stepped up to Katara. "Ok; this should be easy!" Ty Lee delivered a series of quick jabs with the tips of her fingers to Katara's doughy midriff. "Feel any better?"

"-Burrraaaap-!" Katara replied, spraying Ty Lee's face with spittle, making her scrunch up her features. "I'm so sorry! Its just that my stomach isn't settled yet from my meal and you kept poking me!"
-----

Ty Lee had broken a sweat after her fifth try at reversing the chi block. "Maybe I can't strike the points properly because all that tummy fat you've got...." Ty Lee mused. Katara reddened, her expression a visage of growing horror . Toph was delighted at the suggestion. "Then I guess I'm not losing my appetite anytime soon! Good try Ty Lee! I heard this place has good desserts, lets go raid a restaurant!"

Katara grabbed Ty Lee's shoulder. "Wait, wait! Maybe you just aren't striking hard enough! I don't care if you bruise me, just fix this!"

"Katara?! Toph?!" A more mature voice than Ty Lee's rang through the nearly empty training hall.

Suki, clad in Kiyoshi armor and face paint, was advancing up to the girls.
"It's great to see you....but....are you both ok?" Katara could see Suki's shocked expression through her heavily painted features; her eyes kept darting to Ty Lee's, as if begging for an explanation as to why they were both at the temple in the middle of the night, and to why they looked so....different.

Ty Lee looked as if a bolt of inspiration had hit her. "I know!" Ty Lee gave an aerial flip, landed in front of Suki, and delivered a series of strikes to her abdomen. Suki gasped in surprise, expecting a story from Ty Lee, not an assault, and promptly fainted after the final blow was completed. "Ty Lee, did you just perform the technique on Suki?!"

Ty Lee didn't look satisfied. "Its easy to make someone faint if you miss a point...maybe I've just been the one screwing up." her briefly downcast expression suddenly sparked back to an inspired grin. "You said this technique makes you really hungry? I'll know for sure if I'm getting the points right if I do this then!" Ty Lee arced her hand around to her midsection, and delivered the same pattern of blows to her own body. She swooned briefly, but with an acrobat's talent kept herself steady. "Wow. I do feel hungry. This works fast! I can definitely fix you up Katara, but you're going to have to help. On the count of three, take a fast step forward as I run at you! If the first blow strikes deep enough, that is all we should need to get things going! Toph might be harder, but maybe if I use a staff it can work. Then I'll fix myself, of course. Oh...and Suki. She's going to be maaaaaad at me."

Katara, standing mouth agape as she watched Ty Lee afflict both Suki and herself with a chi block, could only nod. Ty Lee took a few steps back. "Ready?"
"Yeah, I am." Katara was smiling, confident that this would be the end of her problems. However shoddy Ty Lee's methodology may be, she had absolute confidence in her abilities; she was always a formidable opponent while working with Azula.

Ty Lee charged, beginning her count. "One, two, -" Katara took a steady step forward. Bringing all of her weight to bear, she stomped up a pace...uprooting a floorboard with her bulk as she did. Ty Lee tripped over the sudden hurdle, flew laterally across the room, and came down hard onto her side.

Katara spun around. "Ty Lee!" she willed her out-of-shape body to run, feeling like she was moving with a couple of sandbags saddled below her hips.

"I...I think I fractured my wrist...." Ty Lee whimpered.
1313211111111111.title: To the temple!

13132111111111111.content:
Katara hefted herself over to Ty Lee. Having just recently stuffed herself full of oily rice, her bending powers were somewhere close to their full capacity. Katara let her hand rest on Ty Lee's wrist. A clean blue light briefly came to life underneath her hand, and Ty Lee's expression relaxed. "Wow!" Ty Lee got up and flexed her wrist back and forth in front of her face, completely free of pain. "Now Ty Lee, you need to undo the chi blocks on yourself and Suki! It starts out innocently enough but the next thing you know you're a total food addict!" Katara tried not to stand too close to Ty Lee after the treatment, aware that she still hadn't bathed since before the boat trip.

Ty Lee's joy at being healed seemed to fade a bit upon hearing this. "That's terrible! I'll get right to it!" Ty Lee's exposed stomach growled behind her words, and her expression glazed over a bit, as if she was smelling something savory."....umm...but first a snack break! I'm starved!"

Katara's eyes widened. "Ty Lee, no!" Toph, now more than ready for another meal, quickly cut Katara off. "Now you're talkin'! Take me to the best restaurant in Kiyoshi!" Ty Lee licked her lips and shook her head. "Forget dinner! A big plate of Kiyoshi desserts for me!" the acrobat then lithely sprinted from the temple.

"Hey! Wait up!" Toph began to waddle out of the temple after her, worked up over the idea of another pile of food to gorge on.
"Ty Lee! Wait!" Katara shouted and also gave chase, concerned that it would only take a short time before even they were too plump to reverse the chi block on themselves. Katara also made a beeline for the temple's door.

Katara and Toph reached the standard single-frame door at the same time, and both attempted to heave themselves through it at the same time. Toph attempted to get her bare, shaking belly around Katara's jutting rump by turning sideways, but this was exactly Katara's idea. The waterbender's rear end squished into the doorframe, pushing her flabby but mostly unobtrusive gut into Toph's much more developed midsection. Their momentum only served as the push needed to get into such a tightly-packed position, and both girls grunted with discomfort as their sweat mingled, their respective girths jamming them against each other.

"Back off, sugar queen!" Toph tried to wriggle her hips to unwedge her stomach. "Toph, you are not going to sabotage this because you like to overeat!" Katara raised her arms and tried to pull back against Toph's bulging midriff. "Quit stinking up the place!" Toph spat. Katara inhaled sharply, extremely agitated. "We wouldn't even be stuck if you didn't let yourself become such a dirty little piglet!" Katara brought her hands to her rear and tried to shift some of the doughy flesh through her stretch pants. Toph scowled. "Look who's talking! I hope Ty Lee grows a nice big potbelly right off the bat like me! If she's going to get a bad case of hippocow-butt like you it'll take forever for you to get off her case!" Katara snapped back with her usual gripe. "You can't possibly think we should live our lives like this?!" Beads of sweat poured down Katara's forehead, slicking strands of her long hair against her cheek. Toph, no longer calm enough to have this conversation yet again with Katara, craned her neck forward, and belched directly into her uptight friend's face. Katara coughed and stuck her tongue out, recovering quicker than before, having unknowingly grown more accustomed to her friend's lack of manners. "Real mature! How would you feel right now if I decided to rip a huge....." Katara stopped and turned her softened features to the interior of the temple. "....wait...where did Suki go?!"

Toph heaved her stomach out of the doorframe, tumbling outside. Planted on the ground with a cloud of dirt around her, Toph grinned at her friend. "Where do you think she'd be at a time like this?"

1313211111111111111.content:
Toph gestured to the gentleman working behind the counter, and another elephant koi was slid into the makeshift fat friar that Toph had helped the restaurant build. This one would be all for Suki; if she wasn’t sporting enough blubber to make her immune to one of Ty Lee’s over-the-top poking sprees before Katara got in the way, all of Toph’s hard work would have been for naught. And if Suki and Ty Lee stayed skinny, Toph might be forced to do the unthinkable and try and drop a few pounds! Toph ran her fingers down her midriff, proud to feel that her belly button was poking out from underneath her once extremely oversized green shirt. Not the artificial bulge that came with overeating; this was the real deal, genuine fat that shook floorboards and halted conversations. In fact, since Toph left Ba Sing Se, not a single person had called her “little girl”! On top of how fun eating had become and the impossibility of keeping up with basic hygiene, Toph was convinced this was the life, and she intended to keep herself and her friends on the path to gluttony, even if they didn’t see the perks of the deal right away.

"You’re seriously picking up the tab for all of this, Toph?” Suki, now without her armor and makeup, was eyeballing the frying fish and licking her lips. She had woken up in a bit of a daze, and while she wanted to find Ty Lee to make it clear that she would have be once again treated like one of the ten-year-old trainee Kiyoshi warrior girls for her behavior, she wanted something to fill her stomach even more. She had dashed out for a bite to eat, and found herself staying for more than a snack. Toph had arrived a few minutes later, riding a small wave of dynamically bended earth. By then,Suki had eaten a three course meal, complete with dessert, to her great satisfaction. However, Toph insisted that she stick around the restaurant for a lfew more minutes while Katara searched for Ty Lee. As Toph went behind the counter, threw money at the employees, and began creating an oil-frying device with her metal-bending, Suki found herself getting a little peckish again. Fast forward and hour, and she was still going strong!

“So...don’t take this the wrong way Toph, but you’ve put on a little weight since I last saw you...” Suki, unlike Toph, took the time to cut into her fish with a knife before eating it. Toph had hopped onto the stool next to her, grunting as she reached over her stomach to get at the next hunk of fried fish. Suki finished another few bites, and continued speaking. “Mphg. That’s good. So there’s no chance I’m going to go through the same thing you are if I binge for a bit? Katara’s really out looking for Ty Lee, and she’s going to fix me up? The situation didn't look good, from what I last remember...”

“Yeah,don't sweat it! I mean, you might as well feel good while we track her down, if you don’t eat you’ll feel awful! I'm payin', so eat as much as you can handle!” Toph belched, spraying flecks of fish onto her stomach, which was squished up into the counter. Thankfully the stool she was sitting on was made of metal; its small diameter still made her fleshy rear end uncomfortable, however.

Suki watched her friend devour yet more food, and knew that Toph clearly didn’t care if Ty Lee wasn’t found. However, something kept her rooted to her stool. The more fish she stuffed into her sleek frame, the better she felt. Paradoxically, now that she had picked up her eating pace, she found that she felt less full. “Well...when I’m done eating I’m going to try and find her myself...she’s technically my responsibility....but for now, I can really use another one of these guys!” Suki held up a few fish bones, stripped clean. “This kind of stuff is terrible for my complexion, but what the heck!”

Toph smiled, her second chin quivering a bit as she began to lick her fingers clean. Suki wouldn’t take long at all to develop. That fact, on top of the way she left Katara, reassured the flabby earthbender.



Katara heaved herself through the village of Kyoshi Island, sweat darkening her robes under her arms, below her neck, around her waist, down her back, and just around the area where her rear end’s flab began to smush together. Despite taking long, nourishing gulps of air, Katara could barely catch her breath as she searched every inn and restaurant she could find for the missing Ty Lee. Kyoshi Island was by no means big, but a girl with her body was in no condition to run around town looking for an acrobat with a sweet tooth, especially when it was getting annoying to squeeze into single-frame doorways. As the pear-shaped waterbender labored down the main road, Katara realized she was leaving an invisible trail of noxious gas wherever she went, her body more used to flatulence than exercise. Her face reddened as she noticed plenty of townspeople staring at her, watching her rather impotent progress through the town. All the while, Katara pictured Toph bending her way into town with no physical exertion whatsoever, headed to fatten up Suki, and Ty Lee indulging in pastry after pastry, her perfectly thin body beginning to soften...
1313211111111111111.title: Suki...

13132111111111111111.content:
Ty Lee was treating herself to her tenth round of desserts when a shadow fell over her platter of chocolate-frosted flaky rolls, and the sweet, mellow scent that lingered in the bakery was eclipsed by the earthy reek of sweat and body odor. This didn't dissuade Ty Lee from starting on another pastry, but she did turn to check out what was making the bakery smell like the Kiyoshi warriors' laundry room.

"I....I found you!" Katara stood erect, clearly out of breath and exercised past her comfort zone. Her chin seemed to recede into her soft face every time she inhaled, making her double chin wax and wane in thickness. "Ty Lee, you need to reverse the chi block on yourself and Suki!"

"I will! As soon as I'm done eating, Katara!" Ty Lee gestured towards the twenty or thirty pastries sitting on her table. Ty Lee's exposed stomach had rounded out into a firm ball, clearly bloated by the dense cremes and doughs she had been scarfing down for quite some time. "You also need to stop eating!" Katara reached out and grabbed an elongated pastry covered in chocolate fudge, and crammed it into her own mouth. This instantly made Ty Lee pout. "Hey, I can always order more, y'know! Eating my sweets won't make me stop!" Katara shook her head. "No, I'm eating your food because I just can't resist! I'm starving! That's exactly my point Ty Lee, you may feel good now, but it's like stopping your acrobatic routine; the longer you relax, the harder it is to come back from it!"

"Oooh...I get it." Ty Lee put a half-eaten pastry down on her plate. She seemed somber for a moment and put a finger to her lip. "This is gonna stink when I stop in a week or so." She snatched up the half-eaten pastry and gulped it down without fanfare.

Katara grit her teeth. "A week is too long! You'll be way too far gone! What are these called by the way?" Katara had grabbed another pastry mid speech and was now pointing toward it. "Oh, those are chocolate-frosted flaky rolls!" Katara gestured to the baker, a cheery looking woman who couldn't have weighed less than 300 pounds, called out an order for thirty chocolate covered flaky rolls, and turned back to Ty Lee. "Forget I just did that and stop eating!!" Katara knew Ty Lee's childlike naivete would try her patience, but she was so frazzled from her waddle through town that she could barely keep her thoughts coherent.

The baker soon had Katara's order ready. Placing a bamboo tray filled with fattening delights onto the counter top, she beamed at the two girls that had quickly become the day's best customers. "Excuse me sweetheart, may I ask where you got your outfit?" Katara looked up at the baker as she grabbed her sweets. "Oh; my grandmother made them for me...why do you ask?" The bosomy woman smiled warmly at Katara. "You must have the same dress size as my oldest daughter, and your robe is just beautiful!"
Katara blushed slightly. "Oh...thank you...but I'm embarrassed, I'm kind of outgrowing it..."
"Well, that's only natural!" The baker replied, still smiling.

As Katara returned to Ty Lee, Katara felt oddly soothed. "Maybe I'm not such a freak after all...just a little full figured..." she thought. Katara saw that Ty Lee had gobbled up the last of her 10th round of pastries.

"I'm -so- up for elevenths!" Ty Lee shouted, waving at the baker, who went right to work.
