131321111111111111111111112.content:
(Story structure note: From this point on Azula's story and the story of Katara, Toph, and company will be continued in separate chapter lines. The events of both will remain canon in one another with possibility of paths crossing however the stories following their travels up until the final showdown will be separated.)

"More! Bring me more!" Azula howled in anger drool cascading over her lip. Azula wasn't angry at anything that had happened but the mere fact there was still food left and she was being kept waiting sent Azula into a fury. The pile in which Azula had planted herself was reduced to emptied barrels licked clean of their contents and deflated sack of sugar. Azula was reluctant to reactivate her bending to look for any scraps left and screamed bloody murder at her obese military to bring her whatever may be left. Fearfully a pair of chubby fire nation girls quickly brought the only barrel of cooking oil they could find to Azula. Azula grunted in frustration as she snatched the barrel from them bending calories into the muscles of her arms to lift the barrel over her head and chug it with ease.

The two girls took a few steps back before she threw the barrel back down. The girls weren't even soldiers, they were just the daughters of a fire kingdom nobleman who were traveling to the nearby fire nation base to meet their bother a lieutenant in the fire nation army when their caravan was raided by Azula for food. The young spoiled women foolishly tried to protest the treatment, only to find themselves arrested by the same crippling impact every other girl in Azula's army had felt. After they recovered from the simple attack all they could think about was food, gnawing unyielding hunger gripped them and dictated their actions. Since then they had spent the last two days chained to a post at Azula's side lorded over by the massive tyrant. Fed only scraps and forced to endure her endless flatulence and constant demands their weak pampered spirits were crushed. No longer were they naive upper class socialite, they were beginning to strip away all their refined manners and status. Their dreams had turned from marrying a rich man to take care of them into dreams of spending the rest of their days at Azula's side hopelessly trying to satiate both hers and their own endless hunger.

"Is that all you worms could find for me?!" Azula shrieked with unbalance and tossed the barrel like a plaything having not fully deactivated her bending. The barrel soared across the village and landed with crash on an abandoned cabbage cart that had been picked clean. Azula began bending calories into her legs and leapt to her feet with shocking ease landing again with a deep thud sending heavy vibrations across the ground. She turned scanning the collections of empty boxes and depleted pots of liquid. She turned a sharp eye at June who was licking the last grains of sugar from her fingertips with a smirk. All her obese followers had only a bowed head to offer her as she looked for any remaining provisions.

"Fine then!" Azula breathed heavily some mental sanity beginning to return to her with no more food to gorge, sweat beaded again on her face. "This raid was assuredly more prosperous than recent excursions" Azula continued her voice evening out as she pushed a stand of hair out of her face and tucked it back into her greasy bang. "But you worthless cows still took far too long to clean out this village! I began my closing feast before half of you even returned with your offering to my stockpile of sustenance!" Azula cast a maddening eye at her soldiers and slaves some of the insanity leaking back into her voice. "Do not keep me waiting!" She roared heat jetting from her mouth as a fire welled up within her. "Now bring me my royal carriage you filthy swine!" Azula cursed

Azula's demands were quickly obeyed as a large cart pulled by a dozen or more large bullboar was led into the town square. The buggy was a caravan wagon that had been stripped of parts of it's enclosure and a wide plush couch mounted on it. On either of it several chains were bolted to the ground just inches from the seat so Azula could bind recently turned girls in and treat them like her new pets as she broke them in to be her loyal slobs. The two nobleman's daughters still shook with fear their developing folds of fat quivering at the sight of them, while most of her entourage now regarded them with respect finding their time bound so closely to Azula's side a necessary part of their eye being opened to this new life. Behind the ponderous queen of gluttony's would be throne parts of the Caravan's original structure remained, several shelves and straps for securing food stores that Azula would need to placate her on the trip ahead.

Azula's face twisted with rage when she saw the shelves had been restocked. "What is the meaning of this treachery?!" Azula snapped "Once again you fat whores did not inform me there was more to eat??" Azula's rage was something the girls had to endure. They knew this would happen but they learned early on giving Azula all the food meant they would go hungry on the trip ahead. If Azula became hungry on the trek to the next village she would begin ordering her soldier off their own mounts so she could cook them for her own meal leaving the poor obese women to walk the rest of the way. As Azula calmed down once more she looked to several of the earth nation girls with dominance "Well what did you find?" Azula asked tired of the outbursts her incompetent slaves made her endure.

"Several barns and stable were on the far side of the town Mistress!" One of the larger girls squeaked her voice slightly trembling "We secured them before the feeling townsfolk could gain access and escape on any useful stock. There were seven bullboar for you to use among the beast available"

"Seven?" Azula was impressed "That's wonderful" she smiled devilishly. With a nod to her servants leading her cart seven of the bullboar were uncoupled from the cart and led to Azula.

"These beasts have been pulling the cart the longest" A round earth nation girl in tight stained robes bowed to her "They won't last much longer carrying the weight of your magnificent corpulence my queen"

"Then they have served their purpose, it's time they fulfilled their final act of service" Azula bended some calories into her arm so she could lift it and pointed it at the large beasts of burden "Become my meal!" Azula laughed manically as she immersed the bovine hogs in flame "Your existence shall continue as a part of my fat!" Azula concluded as the flames died down leaving only a barbecued banquet. "Cut it up and bolster our supplies!" Azula ordered as some of the earth nation girls formed large sharp cleavers made of rock and cut the cooked bullboar into manageable chunks of meat.

Azula climbed up onto her cart and plopped down into the sofa with a heavy thump as the new beasts were lashed to the front. Several other spoils from the stables were brought out as well so some of the newer girls who had been walking could ride as well, The two new nobleman's girls were able to share a hippocow as a mount for now. "Lets move out ladies!" Azula shouted to her congregation "I will not tolerate calories lost while dawdling!"

"Where too mistress?" One of the fire nation soldiers clad in tight armor spoke up "There is a fire nation stronghold to the north we may raid"

Azula snarled showing her teeth "A waste of my sublime talent! Ever since my sniviling coward of a brother took over he has recalled much of the military back to the homeland. There won't be much more than a skeleton crew left to maintain the fortress and any useful armaments or munitions are surely removed" Azula spat in disgust as her bother's soft policies "But the Worst of it is any food stores they may be left with are little more than military rations, all protein no fat! We will not waste precious calories on such refuse. We will continue north past it to the village of Makapu! March my corpulent valkyrie!"

As they rode Azula continued to have one of her maiden pluck food from the stores behind her and feed her between outbursts at her forces for taking too long "Pick up the pace you sow! Anyone who slows our progress is wasting calories! My calories! That's the same as cutting off my heavenly fat and that is tantamount to assassination!" Azula would vociferate at the top of her lungs spewing food and saliva across her belly. Beside her a sack of bread lay in reach always restocked after each raid. Azula would grab hunks of the break and use them to dab and soak up butter and lard that has spilled down and pooled in the rolls of fat under her chin. Azula stuffed a few loafs into her cleavage to remove the extra cooking oil that overflowed her mouth. After the bread had taken in all the butter and oil it could hold Azula stuffed them into her mouth, no calorie could go unused. 'I can not be allowed to waste so much of my immaculate flesh! MOVE FASTER" Azula roared and let a blast of fire erupt from her mouth, the flame rising up over the forest canopy.

1313211111111111111111111121.content:
The wheels of Azula's mobile platform slowly began to cut deeper and deeper ruts into the dirt road as her small band of warriors pressed north to their next meal. Azula's abusive commands thinned out becoming more spaced out as she was subdued by food. It was the most relaxed Azula became these days. The trip from one raid to the next with plenty of time to gorge and take a break was one of the few factors that kept Azula from drifting into absolute insanity.

Watching her food and sweat stain robes slowly fill in once more as her well deserved reward of another successful raid was turned into fat to bolster her power and beauty Azula continued to placate the voracity of her hunger with the remaining spoils stocked around her. Another haunch of meat from her fried bullboars was brought to her by her servant and Azula tore into it with a bestial hunger ensuring her robes would fill in with more than just replaced weight sending her to new heights of obesity. However even through her pacified state of mind brought on by the indulgent repose Azula's hunger for more power and more food never dulled. After picked that last bits of meat from the toasted animal's bone and licking the seared fat away Azula let loose anew with her demands.

"Do not let your greedy fat fingers slack from your reins!" She erupted once more as liquid trickled out the corners of her mouth. Azula's salivation always going to into overdrive as she ate, which was at least nine tenths of her waking day. Azula had been taking note of how frequently her plump escort's hands were dipping into their satchels for snacks. Once more her paranoia was twisting her mind and she was certain their pace was slowing down as the frequency of their snacking increased. "There is a new feast for me waiting ahead and you worthless hogs are keeping me from it! Your queen's magnificent girth shall not be wasted by your incompetent foolishness!" Azula screamed and formed a whip of fire to crack at them taking several shots at the riders closest to her. She made a few close pops at a few of her guards make them yelp as they pushed their mounts to move their chubby bodies out of her reach, One poor girl got a light nick of heat on her tailbone as the whip cracked just inched from her. Azula let the flames whisk away and dropped her arm back onto her fat with a slap sending waves throughout her corpulence as she panted out of breath, sweat making her glisten in the fading illumination of the sun.

Her army obeyed without question save for a grumpy "hrmph" from June. Azula was demanding, cruel, and selfish. Her endless demands getting more and more fierce as she grew were the demands of a tyrant obsessed with their own greedy desires. Azula made no attempts to mask this fact, she happily embraced her food lust and power hungry goals centered around gluttony. Azula's madness that stemmed from her hunger was also growing more and more unbalanced almost as fast as she was growing in size. What was once a insatiable look in her eye as she ate had become a crazed void of obsession. Looking in her eyes as she ate was looking into bottomless pools of gluttony, and it was this bottomless feeling that drove Azula even more mad.

However her softening soldiers did not mind these facts at all. Quite the opposite it drove them even harder to please her and her gut. As twisted as it was through all the abuse and snarled teeth aimed at them her soldiers beamed with pride as she berated them with insults. They smiled to themselves as she yelled for more to eat. No matter how much she screamed bloody murder and hatred at them, her servants loved her.

They would blush when they watched her eat. They felt nervous anticipation as they set out mounds of food for her during raids, eager to see her appear and devour their tributes. Electric joy lit up their bodies when Azula's gorging had out paced her garments and she had to remove her armor or loosen a sash to make room for her growth. Even with all the abuse they had endured from her, the torture, the stuffing, being taken from their lives and forced into her service, inflicted by the same hunger that Azula felt, they all felt an obligation to Azula and a deep desire to follow and serve her. Somewhere between the fear they first felt when Azula appeared in their towns or outposts, and the point where they were just another of her fat soldiers marching behind her to instill fear into others they had all been broken by Azula.

As the parade of slobs continued on as dusk bathed their round bodies in an orange glow Azula couldn't help but notice just how far a few of her followers had come. Off to Azula's right a small group of earth nation girls rode on a pack of cow hippo. Wrapped in ragged garments they salvaged from the most recent raid after their clothes were once again over extended by their fattening bodies these girls were among the largest in Azula's charge. Their gains since they became Azula's entourage were topped only by Azula herself. While the girls never used the same extreme calorie burning bending Azula did their own earth bending did consume a few extra calories too and they never ate quite the massive meals Azula enjoined non-stop. But still these girls were only a short distance behind Azula in mass, each just above the three hundred pound threshold. Azula gazed at the copper colored light that shined of their sweaty rolls as she recalled where this all started.

1411.content:
Tifa Lockhart needed this vacation.

Cloud had been in one of his distant moods for weeks now and was rarely around. Denzel and Marlene were both in school and as such didn't need Tifa as much as they used to. So when she saw the ad in a magazine for the cruise around the Planet, she decided that a vacation was in order.

She was not going to limit herself and experience everything the familiar and not-so-familiar stops on this cruise had to offer. She'd try anything and refuse nothing that was freely given.

So, packing her bags and arriving at the departure point in Kalm, Tifa was soon ushered onto the ship, one Locke's Treasure by name. Her cabin was spacious and certainly more than she would have taken if she wasn't in her vacation mindset. One of the attendants soon had her luggage set down where she wanted and asked if she wanted room service.

"Yes I would."

"Very well, give me your order and I'll have it brought to you as soon as possible."

Tifa, feeling incredibly giddy, responded. "Give me one of everything on your menu."

The attendant nodded and soon left, leaving Tifa to sink back on her large bed and exhale.

"Ahhh...vacation..."

An hour later, a cart was wheeled in, diverting Tifa's attention away from the television program she was currently watching, finding herself oddly drawn to it. Said program was a cartoon, something she normally wouldn't watch, but there was something about the animation, and the main character, a female pig, that drew her in.

As the attendant left her alone, Tifa returned to the cartoon, watching the sow dive into a trough and eat messily.

Picking up a large bowl of ice cream from the cart, Tifa repeated the action, slurping, grunting, and outright making a pig of herself as she ate. Once she was done, she blinked a bit and noticed her messy clothes from the ice cream binge.

"What was that all about?"
1411.title: Tifa's Vacation

choices: Tifa wakes up the next day and decides to go for a swim.
Tifa watches the cartoon in full the next day and loses some manners.
14112.content:
The departure horn soon sounded and Tifa shook her head.

No need to worry about it. She'd just have to be more careful when eating ice cream in the future. The cartoon had ended while Tifa was thinking and she gave a pout at missing it. She'd catch it in full the next time it was on, she decided.

But now there was still a lot of food to eat and she was feeling quite hungry.

Hoagies, spaghetti, hot dogs, liver and onions, this was just a tiny portion of the food Tifa managed to eat, the cart slowly emptying of food as time passed. By the time Tifa felt truly full, she had packed away about a tenth of the food on the cart. Rubbing her full stomach as gently as possible, Tifa couldn't help but giggle.

"I really am quite the piggy. But it's a vacation so who cares if I gain a few pounds? I'll have them worked off a week or two after I get back."

Confident in this, Tifa decided a nap was in order and was soon asleep, snoring loudly, something she didn't do often.

Unknown to the slumbering martial artist, the entire cruise was an experiment being run by Neo Shinra to test out their latest subversive devices. The cartoon was meant to be used in covert ops for subliminally turning an enemy agent, the food was laced with appetite enhancers, designed to limit the effectiveness of opposing infantrymen and their support. There were more of course, but the company started with these two on every passenger to join.

The true effectiveness of this experiment would be shown at the end, and Tifa Lockhart was about to find out firsthand how effective these initial devices were.
14112.title: The ship takes off and Tifa decides to ignore t...

choices: Tifa gets to the Pool as planned
Tifa is waylaid by someone or something
141121.content:
Tifa woke fairly early the next day, partly due to how her late afternoon nap turned into a nights sleep, so even though it was 5 in the morning she'd still had 12 hours of sleep. However, she mainly woke up because she was ravenously hungry.

Deciding that she didn't want to disturb anybody this early, she perused the remaining food on the trolley she'd ordered yesterday for something that would taste good cold. Finding some sliced ham, bread, butter, jam, croissants, boiled eggs and a stack of pancakes with a jug of syrup, Tifa moved her breakfast in front of the television and turned it on to find more of the cartoon that she had been watching the day before and began to shovel food into her mouth as fast as she could swallow it. Caught up in the strangely enticing cartoon, she didn't realise how much or how quickly she was eating and a few mintues after finishing what was in front of her another wave of hunger enticed her to scavenge for increasingly unsuitable food.

About an hour after she started her breakfast a break in the cartoon gave left Tifa the presence of mind to decide that there wasn't anything left on the trolley that was particularly appetising having sat there un-refrigerated or un-heated for half a day and she decided it was time to move on from breakfast. Also that she was wearing clothes that had both been slept in and had an uncharacteristic amount of food spilled on them, though the effects of the cartoon lingered enough to prevent her incredibly bloated stomach from really registering consciously. So she grabbed her suitcases from where she had dumped them upon arrival and easily carried the two heavy bags over to the giant wardrobe that took up one wall of her cabin, with the intention of unpacking them. She was thwarted in this attempt, however, by the discovery that none of the doors on it seemed to actually open, or at least not before the she stopped trying harder for fear of breaking them.

After a small amount of investigation she came upon a small button marked "Wardrobe", which she pressed.

"Welcome to your automated wardrobe system." said an electronic voice, "This system will attempt to provide for all of your clothing needs during your voyage. Please place any suitcases you may have beneath the bed and stand on the illuminated floor tile so that we may scan for your style and size preferences."

"This is amazing!" thought Tifa, following the instructions, "I can't begin to imagine how expensive this system must be."

"Scanning." stated the voice, as blue light fields began to move through the area beneath the bed and the area in which Tifa stood, "Should you want to use any clothing of your own be aware that there is a laundry available for personal items on deck 3. Wardrobe items can be returned for cleaning using the shoot illuminated now."

A flap in the wall flashes briefly

"Please be aware that this system is currently in testing and there may be callibration issues. Should you wish to perform a re-scan to better personalise your wardrobe simply press the button and request a re-scan. Similarly feedback can be registered in the same way, as well as this introduction."

The blue light fields finish moving through their respective areas.

"Scanning complete, please press the button when you are ready to select your outfit."

"Wonderful!" Tifa exclaimed, sitting on her bed, "I'm beginning to wish I hadn't packed so many clothes. I doubt I'll need anything other than this wardrobe can provide. Hmm, I guess I should work out what I'm going to do with my morning."

After a few minutes thought, during which she unconsciously rubbed her distended stomach, firm from all of the food packing into it, Tifa decided that she felt like getting some exercise in to start the day (never mind the fact that she had already started it with a binge, that didn't occur to her, breakfast doesn't count), so she stood up and pressed the button again.

"State your required attire." said the voice.

"Swimwear please." asked Tifa.

"Wait one moment." it responded and, after a brief whirring noise, one of the wardrobe doors opened and a hanger moved forward bearing a fairly sensible looking bikini, solid black bottoms with a white string top, on a rail next to it was a large plain white towel. "Please state if these are unsuitable."

"That'll do nicely." Tifa smiled, she had something very much like it in one of her suitcases, and pulled the bikini off the hanger and tossing it only the bed, swiftly followed by the towel. Both hanger and rail then retracted into the wardrobe, the door shutting behind it.

Removing her now somewhat dirty white t-shirt, black miniskirt and underwear, throwing them into a pile in the corner, Tifa donned the swimsuit, pulling the bikini bottom up over her sleek muscular thighs with ease and into place over her firm buttocks. Then putting the top in place beneath her breasts tied the strings first behind her back and then, pulling it up over her sizable, yet perky breasts, behind her neck. She also redid her hair, braiding it so that it wouldn't get in the way or tangle.

Admiring herself in the mirror, ignoring her bloated midsection once more, and admiring the wardrobe for its perfect choices of style and size, Tifa wrapped the towel round her wait and left her room to find the pool.

145.content: Maybe gluttony overcomes the heroes and heroines of these Final Fantasy titles?
145.title: Final Fantasy (Open Slot)

1451.content:
Here a few storylines for the lovely ladies of Cocoon and Pulse to gain:

Option A: Lightning focused. After helping to save the world and stopping Orphan, Lightning finds herself invited to more and more feasts along with her compatriots. These banquets and feasts start to take their toll on her waistline.

Option B: Fang and Vanille focused. During the events of the game, in Gran Pulse, Fang and Vanille find themselves captured by an intelligent Flan. They are forced to eat the odd food the creature gives them or starve.

Option C: Other FFXIII females. After the L'Cie have returned to their normal lives, one of the other characters find themselves softening as humanity rebuilds on the wild world of Pulse.
1451.title: Final Fantasy XIII

choices: Lightning is invited to a banquet next week along with her sister.
Her superior invites her over to dinner with his family.
14511.content:
Lightning Farron, the Guardian Corp solider who had saved the world, was currently in uniform and trying her best to look professional as the crowd of citizens cheered for her and her friends. The former L'Cie were the toast of burgeoning civilization, a source of strength and inspiration for the struggling populace free from Cocoon. Several chefs were catering this latest feast and all were clamoring for the heroes to be the first to taste their cooking.

So it was that Lightning was ushered from station to station and handed plate after plate of rich, decadent food. There were pastas with exotic names, sugary puddings, and the oddest bread she had ever tasted. Still as the night wore on the solider found her belly reaching it's capacity. She had never really eaten so much food since she was a small child and the result was a horrific ache in her stomach, the lean muscles trying to hold back the onslaught of calories she had just ingested.

Glancing over at her friends, Lightning saw that Sahz and Snow were in a similar boat as her. Hope, on the other hand, was still eating, a pleased look on his face.

Even Lightning's sister was rubbing her full stomach.

A tap on her shoulder made Lightning turn around. It was her superior.

Saluting as fast as she could, she winced a little at the pain in her stuffed stomach.

"At ease Farron." The captain took a deep breath and gazed at the frivolity all around him. Turning back to his prized subordinate, the big man patted her on the shoulder. "Ease up. You and your friends saved the world after all. You deserve a break."

"A break," Lightning repeated, looking down at her stomach.

How many more breaks would she and her friends be subjected to as the months wore on?
14511.title: Option A

choices: Serah notices Lightning gaining some weight a few weeks later.
Lightning soon finds herself eating more on a daily basis.
145112.content:
Captain Adomar managed to corner Lightning later that evening and got a promise to attend a private dinner at his home in honor of his favorite subordinate, followed by a joke from Adomar that she should be his boss and would be if he had any say in the matter.

So it was that the next evening, Lightning, out of her uniform and in a formal evening dress, attended Adomar's dinner. Once inside and seated, Lightning saw just why Captain Adomar was the size he was: the Captain and his wife at stupendous amounts of food.

The Captain's wife, Shuri Adomar, doted on Lightning as soon as all of the food was assembled on the table, prodding Lightning into filling her plate more than once. Lightning, not wanting to offend her, took as much as was offered. This, eventually, caused her to undo a bit of the zipper on her dress, allowing her stuffed stomach more room to expand as Shuri filled her plate once more.

The Captain didn't escape either, Shuri ensuring that he had lots of food as well as eating a hearty amount herself.

"A well-fed soldier will be the best solider," Shuri explained, Lightning nodding at the logic. An army did run on their stomachs after all.

But she had never eaten this much food in her life, and the Captain was also struggling to finish after another plate. Lightning matched him and was even able to down one more thanks to Shuri's insistence and her own desire not to offend.

The end result came in the loud belch that came after finishing her last plate, one that exceeded the one Captain Adomar had let loose only a few moments before hers. Blushing, Lighting started to apologize but Shuri merely giggled and patted Lightning's taut belly.

"A good soldier also isn't that worried about manners on the battlefield."

"But this is a dining room," Lightning said, sweat pouring down her face owing to her exhausted and full condition.

"You'll soon find that there isn't much difference between the two," Shuri responded. "Now after you two are done digesting, I'll get dessert!"

Lightning gave a quiet groan at that, looking at her captain, who looked a bit more pleased at the prospect.

"And Lighting, you will definitely be joining us next week at the same time, right? My husband never brings guests with appetites like yours around and I would be delighted to cook for you again."

"I'll be here," Lightning said, forcing down another belch from escaping.

Shuri smiled at that and once again patted Lighting's stomach.
145112.title: Her superior invites her over to dinner with hi...

choices: Weeks pass as the Flan continues to feed them. Fang and Vanille talk.
A month passes yet Lightning and the rest haven't found them.
14512.content:
Fang cursed to herself.

The Pulsian spear wielder was currently held fast to a wall, bound by her wrists and ankles with some kind of hardened gelatin. All of her strength was useless against her bonds. Vanille was to her left, in the same situation.

It had been a routine scouting mission, the pair confident that they could handle whatever creature was in their way. Then they had run across an enormous Flan. It was almost as big as a King Behemoth but the worst part about it was the intelligent gleam emanating from it's eyes. During their fight the monster had managed to disarm Fang and Vanille with a deceptive trick. Then it knocked them out with a swipe of one arm.

Fang had awakened in her current predicament. Vanille had woken up just twenty minutes earlier.

"We'll get out of this Vanille, I promise," Fang said. Vanille smiled at her.

But before another word could be said a shadow cut off what little light came into the bowels of the cave they were in as the monster reappeared, two large bowls in either hand as it oozed it's way towards them. A bowl was held out to Fang, filled with a greenish goop, much like the color of the Flan's own flesh.

Fang spit at the creature.

Roaring at her, Fang was prepared for a strike but the Flan instead turned towards Vanille and punched her hard in the stomach.

The bowl was then placed before Fang again.

Vanille moaned in pain and Fang quickly took a bite of the strange gelatin-like substance.

Before she knew it Fang had finished off the entire bowl. She could hear Vanille eating as well, the two locking eyes for a brief moment.

They would have to trust in their friends to come and save them.

Fang glanced down and looked at her trim abs, a tiny bit of flab now appearing among the muscles and she shivered.

"Please get here soon," she said quietly, before the fullness in her stomach caused her to close here eyes.
14512.title: Option B

151.content:
It was just another day in the Masaki household, at least that's what everyone thought when they got up this morning. At the moment Tenchi was at school, so the various women who had him as the object of their affection were able to tolerate each other enough so that nothing got blown up, or incinerated, or disintigrated, or, well you get the idea. But even though he was gone, the women in his life still thought about him.

In his room Ryoko, the ochre eyed, cyan haired, semi-retired, space pirate phased through the wall as quietly as possible taking a cursory glance and making sure no one else was there.

"Hello, anybody there, anybody gonna stop me from looking around my Tenchi's room, no, okay then." Ryoko stiffled the giggle that threatened to escape her lips, giddy at how clever she was being. Being a space pirate Ryoko was never one to play fair, so she decided to go the direct route and search Tenchi's room for anything that could help her get a leg up on the competition. So stiffling the desire to ransack the room with all the finese of a drunken elephant, Ryoko starts to methodically search his room in all the places, according to late night TV, that boys liked to hide their naughty belongings.

Searching through Tenchi's drawers, and noting that he was a breifs man, the back of his closet and under the bed, Ryoko was now digging beneath the matress and pulled out a magazene.

"Aha, I knew my Tenchi wasn't such a paragon of goodness as everyone thinks he his." With a gleeful and muffled squeal Ryoko started flipping through the magazene and was stunned at what she saw. Sure enough it was full of scantily clad women in a number of provokative poses but what was really stunning was the fact that none of these women could be under 300 pounds, there was even a photo of two obese women dressed like sumos and wrestling with each other. As hard as it was for her to beleive the proof was right there in front of her.

"Tenchi has a thing for fat girls!?"

So stunned was the space pirate that she didn't hear someone else come up behind her.

"Ryoko, what are you doing in Tenchi's room?"

Ryoko lets off a surprised squwak and whips around to see

Guile lets her sleep. Chun Li dreams of food.

152.content:
It had been a month since Ryu and Ken had defeated Bison and Chun Li was released from the hospital. The Interpol agent was at her home, still on leave from rejoining the force, when she felt the cuts Vega had made on her body ache.

Crying out in pain, Chun Li passed out.

"Kid, hey kid! Wake up!"

Chun Li slowly opened her eyes, seeing the familiar flat hair of Guile, her partner and friend in bringing down Shadowlaw.

"Guile...why are you in my apartment?"

"You've been out for a whole day kiddo. I was just coming round to visit you when I found you passed out on the floor. Seems like you still have some healing to do."

Chun Li looked around her and saw that she was in her bed, covered up tightly.

"But the hospital gave me a clean bill of health," Chun Li protested.

"I know but doctors can't get everything right all the time. I've talked to the hospital that treated you and while they don't think you should be brought in, they do want you to get plenty of rest and eat, okay?"

Chun Li nodded and Guile grinned.

"Great. Now I'm going to nurse you back to health and you better not refuse what I feed you, okay?"

"Fine, but don't give me any protein shakes, those things are nasty," Chun Li, said, making a disgusted face.

Guile laughed and patted her on the head.

"Don't worry. I know some good restaurants around here that will fill you up good. And I'm not that bad of a cook also."

This set Chun Li laughing as she imagined Guile with an apron wrapped around him.

Eventually though...

Everyone near Uncle to gain weight every time he casts a Chi Spell.
Jackie and Tohru to absorb calories from people who are eating nearby.
153.content:
(Set-up info, consider this a filler *pardon the pun* arch in the Demon Portal season)

Shendu was in a rage, spraying fire in every direction. He ignored Valmont's protests about searing his throat, and paid little attention to Fin, Ratso, Chow, or Hak Fu. Or the fact that Fin and Ratso were both on fire. The first three Demon Sorceror's he'd tried to release from Limbo had been banished again almost as soon as they'd been able to return to the mortal plane. The accursed Chan must be removed from the picture. But how?

"CHAN!!" Shendu bellowed, spraying fire into the ceiling of the fish cannery. "That ever present thorn in my side, landslide in my path..." Shendu briefly considered summoning the Shadow Khan, but dismissed that notion as useless almost immediately. Those dark ninjas were skilled, yes, but hardly more effective than his four mortal enforcers. Perhaps less so, given that they lack any drive or imagination of their own.

"We must remove Chan, and the rest of his meddlesome band, from our path if we are to succeed in releasing the last four Demon Sorcerors, and not have them cast back into the Nether as Po Kong, Xiao Fung, and Tchang Zu were." Shendu growled as he stalked back and forth, smoke still billowing from his mouth.

Fin, Ratso, and Chow began to emerge from their hiding places, all of them badly singed. Only Hak Fu had avoided all of the flames. "But how are we supposed to do that, Shen-Dude?" Fin said, patting his still smouldering sleeve. "Chan's too good of a fighter for us, heck, even the Shadow Khan!" Fin flinched backward as Shendu's baleful gaze fell on him but he continued. "He's just way too fast..."

Shendu paused, thinking. "Fast...yes," he said starting to grin. "Yes, we shall just have to slow Chan and the others down...won't we?"

Beginning to laugh at the simplicity of his idea, Shendu prepares a spell that will cause...
153.title: Jackie Chan Adventures.

choices: Backfire! (The curse affects the Enforcers *Finn, Ratso, Chow and/or Hak Fu*)
Success! (Both Tohru and Jackie are affected)
1533.content:
Still chuckling darkly over his new plan Shendu summoned the Shadow Khan. One of them walked forward and bowed before handing the Demon Sorceror a musty tome covered with writing that was indecipherable, due in equal parts to its advanced age and the strange tongue in which it is inscribed.

Shendu sat down and began to page through the book muttering to himself, leaving the Enforcers to scratch their heads in confusion. "...this spell should suffice with only a few adjustments..." The dragon sorceror stroked his/Valmont's chin speculatively. "Meant originally for petty revenge it should serve my purpose nicely if I increase the range..." Shendu paused for a moment, thoughtful. "I think the spell should also be tailored to afflict a former employee of mine...the Sumo Warrior Tohru. He has proved nearly as adept at defeating each of you as Chan has."

"Uhm...Shendu...wha--?" Finn began to ask after 15 more minutes passed in this fashion, but the query died on his lips under a glare that promised more flames if he continued to interrupt.

"Well..." Finn said quietly, "If ya won't be needing us..." Chow added with a nervous laugh, "We'll....just get outta your hair." Finished Ratso. And the three of them turned tail and practically fled from the cannery. Hak Fu remained, standing a silent sentinel.

Roughly half an hour later Shendu called to his Shadow Khan again, and bade them retrieve the necessary spell ingredients. Mindless and without imagination though the Khan were, on errands such as this they were far more efficient than human enforcers, especially seeing to the rarity of a few of the ingredients (these the Khan stole from Uncle's own personal store of ingredients, and for once managed to remain completely undetected).

One by one, the benighted ninjas handed over the ingredients and Shendu began to concoct the spell, chanting softly as he did. The flame in the basin changing color as he dropped in each herb and powder, and giving off ever thicker smoke. As Shendu's incantation reached a crescendo an orb of flames, smoke, and what appeared to be pure light began to form above the basin. As a final touch, Shendu breathed a gout of flame directly into the orb, which brightened to a dazziling glare and exploded outward in a gust of hot air.

"And now, we wait..." Shendu said, looking pleased.

info.brief_description: General gluttony and the inevetable weight gain that comes with it.
info.description:
This is a story focused on weight gain but try to make eating the main trigger for any gaining, magic, technology, special interest means of weight gain are fine but try not to over do it and if possible make them relate to eating or over eating.

Rules are:

No farting to gain, this is the worst plot device for weight gain I've ever heard

Keep Characters in Character, Sereiously it's not hard, this means make them act like they would in the show not your fantasies and don't change their desires so "[character A] wants [character B] fat even though they were never shown as an FA in the show" and don't change them so they always wanted to be fat if they never showed any desire of it in the show unless you have a damn good reason to claim they might.

Write full chapters, don't stop after a few lines, make it count. This is easier than you think, just give it a shoot even if you're not sure if you can, I'll reveiw all entries, if you need help I'll gladly give you tips and pointers, so even if you've never added to one of these before please just give it a shot, I'll help you if you need it so you don't have to worry about not submitting a good entry, I'll help anyway I can. I'm willing to bet many of you can do a lot more than you think you can if you just give it a chance.

Make the options creative, no "You decide" or "Something else", lead them in a fun or interesting direction, if they don't like your choices they can still add what they want regardless of the choice, try making something up, and NO options like "gain 50 pounds, gain 100 pounds" pounds gained is Not a plot point to divide the story over, unless they are eating magic food anyway no one is going to gain anywhere near that much weight in on sitting anyway.

Lastly read this if you want any more pointers:
http://www.writing.com/main/view_item/item_id/1269807

Ok have fun with it, and please try to add, no matter your skill level, I promise you'll have a good entry. Remember, the only way to stimulate new content is to add some yourself so others will want to add on too.
